column17: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name Jesus: for he shall save his people from their sins.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king, behold, there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, Where is he that is born King of the Jews? for we have seen his star in the east, and are come to worship him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Herod the king had heard these things, he was troubled, and all Jerusalem with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together, he demanded of them where Christ should be born.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said unto him, In Bethlehem of Judaea: for thus it is written by the prophet,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And thou Bethlehem, in the land of Juda, art not the least among the princes of Juda: for out of thee shall come a Governor, that shall rule my people Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Herod, when he had privily called the wise men, inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he sent them to Bethlehem, and said, Go and search diligently for the young child; and when ye have found him, bring me word again, that I may come and worship him also.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they had heard the king, they departed; and, lo, the star, which they saw in the east, went before them, till it came and stood over where the young child was.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they saw the star, they rejoiced with exceeding great joy.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come into the house, they saw the young child with Mary his mother, and fell down, and worshipped him: and when they had opened their treasures, they presented unto him gifts; gold, and frankincense, and myrrh.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod, they departed into their own country another way.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were departed, behold, the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream, saying, Arise, and take the young child and his mother, and flee into Egypt, and be thou there until I bring thee word: for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When he arose, he took the young child and his mother by night, and departed into Egypt:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And was there until the death of Herod: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying, Out of Egypt have I called my son.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Herod, when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men, was exceeding wroth, and sent forth, and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem, and in all the coasts thereof, from two years old and under, according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In Rama was there a voice heard, lamentation, and weeping, and great mourning, Rachel weeping for her children, and would not be comforted, because they are not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when Herod was dead, behold, an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, Arise, and take the young child and his mother, and go into the land of Israel: for they are dead which sought the young child's life.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he arose, and took the young child and his mother, and came into the land of Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod, he was afraid to go thither: notwithstanding, being warned of God in a dream, he turned aside into the parts of Galilee:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets, He shall be called a Nazarene.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In those days came John the Baptist, preaching in the wilderness of Judaea,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saying, Repent ye: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias, saying, The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the same John had his raiment of camel's hair, and a leathern girdle about his loins; and his meat was locusts and wild honey.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then went out to him Jerusalem, and all Judaea, and all the region round about Jordan,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And were baptized of him in Jordan, confessing their sins.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism, he said unto them, O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And think not to say within yourselves, We have Abraham to our father: for I say unto you, that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees: therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance: but he that cometh after me is mightier than I, whose shoes I am not worthy to bear: he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost, and with fire:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whose fan is in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and gather his wheat into the garner; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John, to be baptized of him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But John forbad him, saying, I have need to be baptized of thee, and comest thou to me?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answering said unto him, Suffer it to be so now: for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness. Then he suffered him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus, when he was baptized, went up straightway out of the water: and, lo, the heavens were opened unto him, and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove, and lighting upon him:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And lo a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights, he was afterward an hungred.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the tempter came to him, he said, If thou be the Son of God, command that these stones be made bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered and said, It is written, Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city, and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saith unto him, If thou be the Son of God, cast thyself down: for it is written, He shall give his angels charge concerning thee: and in their hands they shall bear thee up, lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus said unto him, It is written again, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again, the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain, and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world, and the glory of them;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saith unto him, All these things will I give thee, if thou wilt fall down and worship me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the devil leaveth him, and, behold, angels came and ministered unto him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison, he departed into Galilee;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And leaving Nazareth, he came and dwelt in Capernaum, which is upon the sea coast, in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The land of Zabulon, and the land of Nephthalim, by the way of the sea, beyond Jordan, Galilee of the Gentiles;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The people which sat in darkness saw great light; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: From that time Jesus began to preach, and to say, Repent: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus, walking by the sea of Galilee, saw two brethren, Simon called Peter, and Andrew his brother, casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he saith unto them, Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they straightway left their nets, and followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And going on from thence, he saw other two brethren, James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother, in a ship with Zebedee their father, mending their nets; and he called them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they immediately left the ship and their father, and followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus went about all Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his fame went throughout all Syria: and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments, and those which were possessed with devils, and those which were lunatic, and those that had the palsy; and he healed them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee, and from Decapolis, and from Jerusalem, and from Judaea, and from beyond Jordan.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And seeing the multitudes, he went up into a mountain: and when he was set, his disciples came unto him:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he opened his mouth, and taught them, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are the merciful: for they shall obtain mercy.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are the pure in heart: for they shall see God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness' sake: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed are ye, when men shall revile you, and persecute you, and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely, for my sake.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Rejoice, and be exceeding glad: for great is your reward in heaven: for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye are the salt of the earth: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be salted? it is thenceforth good for nothing, but to be cast out, and to be trodden under foot of men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Neither do men light a candle, and put it under a bushel, but on a candlestick; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Think not that I am come to destroy the law, or the prophets: I am not come to destroy, but to fulfil.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For verily I say unto you, Till heaven and earth pass, one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law, till all be fulfilled.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments, and shall teach men so, he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven: but whosoever shall do and teach them, the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I say unto you, That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees, ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time, Thou shalt not kill; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment: and whosoever shall say to his brother, Raca, shall be in danger of the council: but whosoever shall say, Thou fool, shall be in danger of hell fire.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar, and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Leave there thy gift before the altar, and go thy way; first be reconciled to thy brother, and then come and offer thy gift.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Agree with thine adversary quickly, whiles thou art in the way with him; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the officer, and thou be cast into prison.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto thee, Thou shalt by no means come out thence, till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time, Thou shalt not commit adultery:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if thy right eye offend thee, pluck it out, and cast it from thee: for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish, and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if thy right hand offend thee, cut it off, and cast it from thee: for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish, and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: It hath been said, Whosoever shall put away his wife, let him give her a writing of divorcement:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, That whosoever shall put away his wife, saving for the cause of fornication, causeth her to commit adultery: and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again, ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time, Thou shalt not forswear thyself, but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, Swear not at all; neither by heaven; for it is God's throne:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nor by the earth; for it is his footstool: neither by Jerusalem; for it is the city of the great King.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head, because thou canst not make one hair white or black.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But let your communication be, Yea, yea; Nay, nay: for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye have heard that it hath been said, An eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, That ye resist not evil: but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek, turn to him the other also.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if any man will sue thee at the law, and take away thy coat, let him have thy cloak also.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile, go with him twain.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Give to him that asketh thee, and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye have heard that it hath been said, Thou shalt love thy neighbour, and hate thine enemy.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, Love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven: for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good, and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For if ye love them which love you, what reward have ye? do not even the publicans the same?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if ye salute your brethren only, what do ye more than others? do not even the publicans so?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men, to be seen of them: otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore when thou doest thine alms, do not sound a trumpet before thee, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may have glory of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That thine alms may be in secret: and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when thou prayest, thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are: for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen do: for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Be not ye therefore like unto them: for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of, before ye ask him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Give us this day our daily bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil: For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever. Amen.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For if ye forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses, neither will your Father forgive your trespasses.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Moreover when ye fast, be not, as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance: for they disfigure their faces, that they may appear unto men to fast. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But thou, when thou fastest, anoint thine head, and wash thy face;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That thou appear not unto men to fast, but unto thy Father which is in secret: and thy Father, which seeth in secret, shall reward thee openly.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt, and where thieves do not break through nor steal:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if thine eye be evil, thy whole body shall be full of darkness. If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness, how great is that darkness!

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: No man can serve two masters: for either he will hate the one, and love the other; or else he will hold to the one, and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and mammon.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field, how they grow; they toil not, neither do they spin:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And yet I say unto you, That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which to day is, and to morrow is cast into the oven, shall he not much more clothe you, O ye of little faith?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Take therefore no thought for the morrow: for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Judge not, that ye be not judged.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For with what judgment ye judge, ye shall be judged: and with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you again.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother, Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye; and, behold, a beam is in thine own eye?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thou hypocrite, first cast out the beam out of thine own eye; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother's eye.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs, neither cast ye your pearls before swine, lest they trample them under their feet, and turn again and rend you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Or what man is there of you, whom if his son ask bread, will he give him a stone?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Or if he ask a fish, will he give him a serpent?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children, how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them: for this is the law and the prophets.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye shall know them by their fruits. Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Many will say to me in that day, Lord, Lord, have we not prophesied in thy name? and in thy name have cast out devils? and in thy name done many wonderful works?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And then will I profess unto them, I never knew you: depart from me, ye that work iniquity.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, which built his house upon a rock:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not: for it was founded upon a rock.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them not, shall be likened unto a foolish man, which built his house upon the sand:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell: and great was the fall of it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, when Jesus had ended these sayings, the people were astonished at his doctrine:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he taught them as one having authority, and not as the scribes.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When he was come down from the mountain, great multitudes followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, there came a leper and worshipped him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will; be thou clean. And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus saith unto him, See thou tell no man; but go thy way, shew thyself to the priest, and offer the gift that Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum, there came unto him a centurion, beseeching him,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saying, Lord, my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy, grievously tormented.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus saith unto him, I will come and heal him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The centurion answered and said, Lord, I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof: but speak the word only, and my servant shall be healed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I am a man under authority, having soldiers under me: and I say to this man, Go, and he goeth; and to another, Come, and he cometh; and to my servant, Do this, and he doeth it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus heard it, he marvelled, and said to them that followed, Verily I say unto you, I have not found so great faith, no, not in Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I say unto you, That many shall come from the east and west, and shall sit down with Abraham, and Isaac, and Jacob, in the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said unto the centurion, Go thy way; and as thou hast believed, so be it done unto thee. And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Jesus was come into Peter's house, he saw his wife's mother laid, and sick of a fever.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he touched her hand, and the fever left her: and she arose, and ministered unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When the even was come, they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils: and he cast out the spirits with his word, and healed all that were sick:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying, Himself took our infirmities, and bare our sicknesses.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him, he gave commandment to depart unto the other side.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a certain scribe came, and said unto him, Master, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus saith unto him, The foxes have holes, and the birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And another of his disciples said unto him, Lord, suffer me first to go and bury my father.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus said unto him, Follow me; and let the dead bury their dead.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was entered into a ship, his disciples followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, there arose a great tempest in the sea, insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves: but he was asleep.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his disciples came to him, and awoke him, saying, Lord, save us: we perish.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he saith unto them, Why are ye fearful, O ye of little faith? Then he arose, and rebuked the winds and the sea; and there was a great calm.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the men marvelled, saying, What manner of man is this, that even the winds and the sea obey him!

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes, there met him two possessed with devils, coming out of the tombs, exceeding fierce, so that no man might pass by that way.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, they cried out, saying, What have we to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of God? art thou come hither to torment us before the time?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So the devils besought him, saying, If thou cast us out, suffer us to go away into the herd of swine.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Go. And when they were come out, they went into the herd of swine: and, behold, the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea, and perished in the waters.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they that kept them fled, and went their ways into the city, and told every thing, and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, the whole city came out to meet Jesus: and when they saw him, they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he entered into a ship, and passed over, and came into his own city.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, they brought to him a man sick of the palsy, lying on a bed: and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy; Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, certain of the scribes said within themselves, This man blasphemeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said, Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For whether is easier, to say, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Arise, and walk?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins, (then saith he to the sick of the palsy,) Arise, take up thy bed, and go unto thine house.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he arose, and departed to his house.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the multitudes saw it, they marvelled, and glorified God, which had given such power unto men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as Jesus passed forth from thence, he saw a man, named Matthew, sitting at the receipt of custom: and he saith unto him, Follow me. And he arose, and followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, as Jesus sat at meat in the house, behold, many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the Pharisees saw it, they said unto his disciples, Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when Jesus heard that, he said unto them, They that be whole need not a physician, but they that are sick.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But go ye and learn what that meaneth, I will have mercy, and not sacrifice: for I am not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came to him the disciples of John, saying, Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft, but thy disciples fast not?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said unto them, Can the children of the bridechamber mourn, as long as the bridegroom is with them? but the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken from them, and then shall they fast.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment, for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment, and the rent is made worse.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles: else the bottles break, and the wine runneth out, and the bottles perish: but they put new wine into new bottles, and both are preserved.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: While he spake these things unto them, behold, there came a certain ruler, and worshipped him, saying, My daughter is even now dead: but come and lay thy hand upon her, and she shall live.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus arose, and followed him, and so did his disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, a woman, which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years, came behind him, and touched the hem of his garment:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For she said within herself, If I may but touch his garment, I shall be whole.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus turned him about, and when he saw her, he said, Daughter, be of good comfort; thy faith hath made thee whole. And the woman was made whole from that hour.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Jesus came into the ruler's house, and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He said unto them, Give place: for the maid is not dead, but sleepeth. And they laughed him to scorn.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the people were put forth, he went in, and took her by the hand, and the maid arose.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Jesus departed thence, two blind men followed him, crying, and saying, Thou Son of David, have mercy on us.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was come into the house, the blind men came to him: and Jesus saith unto them, Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And their eyes were opened; and Jesus straitly charged them, saying, See that no man know it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they, when they were departed, spread abroad his fame in all that country.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As they went out, behold, they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the devil was cast out, the dumb spake: and the multitudes marvelled, saying, It was never so seen in Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the Pharisees said, He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing every sickness and every disease among the people.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when he saw the multitudes, he was moved with compassion on them, because they fainted, and were scattered abroad, as sheep having no shepherd.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith he unto his disciples, The harvest truly is plenteous, but the labourers are few;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest, that he will send forth labourers into his harvest.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples, he gave them power against unclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these; The first, Simon, who is called Peter, and Andrew his brother; James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Philip, and Bartholomew; Thomas, and Matthew the publican; James the son of Alphaeus, and Lebbaeus, whose surname was Thaddaeus;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Simon the Canaanite, and Judas Iscariot, who also betrayed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These twelve Jesus sent forth, and commanded them, saying, Go not into the way of the Gentiles, and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as ye go, preach, saying, The kingdom of heaven is at hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Heal the sick, cleanse the lepers, raise the dead, cast out devils: freely ye have received, freely give.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Provide neither gold, nor silver, nor brass in your purses,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nor scrip for your journey, neither two coats, neither shoes, nor yet staves: for the workman is worthy of his meat.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, inquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when ye come into an house, salute it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if the house be worthy, let your peace come upon it: but if it be not worthy, let your peace return to you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear your words, when ye depart out of that house or city, shake off the dust of your feet.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment, than for that city.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold, I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves: be ye therefore wise as serpents, and harmless as doves.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But beware of men: for they will deliver you up to the councils, and they will scourge you in their synagogues;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them and the Gentiles.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when they deliver you up, take no thought how or what ye shall speak: for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For it is not ye that speak, but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death, and the father the child: and the children shall rise up against their parents, and cause them to be put to death.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that endureth to the end shall be saved.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when they persecute you in this city, flee ye into another: for verily I say unto you, Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel, till the Son of man be come.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The disciple is not above his master, nor the servant above his lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more shall they call them of his household?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Fear them not therefore: for there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; and hid, that shall not be known.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: What I tell you in darkness, that speak ye in light: and what ye hear in the ear, that preach ye upon the housetops.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And fear not them which kill the body, but are not able to kill the soul: but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Fear ye not therefore, ye are of more value than many sparrows.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men, him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But whosoever shall deny me before men, him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth: I came not to send peace, but a sword.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a man's foes shall be they of his own household.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me: and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he that taketh not his cross, and followeth after me, is not worthy of me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that findeth his life shall lose it: and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that receiveth you receiveth me, and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet's reward; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man's reward.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple, verily I say unto you, he shall in no wise lose his reward.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples, he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ, he sent two of his disciples,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto him, Art thou he that should come, or do we look for another?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto them, Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The blind receive their sight, and the lame walk, the lepers are cleansed, and the deaf hear, the dead are raised up, and the poor have the gospel preached to them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And blessed is he, whosoever shall not be offended in me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they departed, Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John, What went ye out into the wilderness to see? A reed shaken with the wind?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But what went ye out for to see? A man clothed in soft raiment? behold, they that wear soft clothing are in kings' houses.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But what went ye out for to see? A prophet? yea, I say unto you, and more than a prophet.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For this is he, of whom it is written, Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, which shall prepare thy way before thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist: notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if ye will receive it, this is Elias, which was for to come.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But whereunto shall I liken this generation? It is like unto children sitting in the markets, and calling unto their fellows,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saying, We have piped unto you, and ye have not danced; we have mourned unto you, and ye have not lamented.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For John came neither eating nor drinking, and they say, He hath a devil.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Son of man came eating and drinking, and they say, Behold a man gluttonous, and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners. But wisdom is justified of her children.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done, because they repented not:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto thee, Chorazin! woe unto thee, Bethsaida! for if the mighty works, which were done in you, had been done in Tyre and Sidon, they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment, than for you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And thou, Capernaum, which art exalted unto heaven, shalt be brought down to hell: for if the mighty works, which have been done in thee, had been done in Sodom, it would have remained until this day.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment, than for thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: At that time Jesus answered and said, I thank thee, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them unto babes.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Even so, Father: for so it seemed good in thy sight.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All things are delivered unto me of my Father: and no man knoweth the Son, but the Father; neither knoweth any man the Father, save the Son, and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn; and his disciples were an hungred, and began to pluck the ears of corn, and to eat.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the Pharisees saw it, they said unto him, Behold, thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he said unto them, Have ye not read what David did, when he was an hungred, and they that were with him;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: How he entered into the house of God, and did eat the shewbread, which was not lawful for him to eat, neither for them which were with him, but only for the priests?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Or have ye not read in the law, how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath, and are blameless?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, That in this place is one greater than the temple.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if ye had known what this meaneth, I will have mercy, and not sacrifice, ye would not have condemned the guiltless.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was departed thence, he went into their synagogue:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, there was a man which had his hand withered. And they asked him, saying, Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days? that they might accuse him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, What man shall there be among you, that shall have one sheep, and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day, will he not lay hold on it, and lift it out?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: How much then is a man better than a sheep? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith he to the man, Stretch forth thine hand. And he stretched it forth; and it was restored whole, like as the other.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the Pharisees went out, and held a council against him, how they might destroy him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when Jesus knew it, he withdrew himself from thence: and great multitudes followed him, and he healed them all;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And charged them that they should not make him known:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold my servant, whom I have chosen; my beloved, in whom my soul is well pleased: I will put my spirit upon him, and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He shall not strive, nor cry; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: A bruised reed shall he not break, and smoking flax shall he not quench, till he send forth judgment unto victory.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil, blind, and dumb: and he healed him, insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all the people were amazed, and said, Is not this the son of David?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the Pharisees heard it, they said, This fellow doth not cast out devils, but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus knew their thoughts, and said unto them, Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if Satan cast out Satan, he is divided against himself; how shall then his kingdom stand?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils, by whom do your children cast them out? therefore they shall be your judges.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God, then the kingdom of God is come unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Or else how can one enter into a strong man's house, and spoil his goods, except he first bind the strong man? and then he will spoil his house.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that is not with me is against me; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore I say unto you, All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men: but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him: but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost, it shall not be forgiven him, neither in this world, neither in the world to come.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Either make the tree good, and his fruit good; or else make the tree corrupt, and his fruit corrupt: for the tree is known by his fruit.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: O generation of vipers, how can ye, being evil, speak good things? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things: and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, That every idle word that men shall speak, they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment.
