column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered, saying, Master, we would see a sign from thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered and said unto them, An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign; and there shall no sign be given to it, but the sign of the prophet Jonas:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale's belly; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: because they repented at the preaching of Jonas; and, behold, a greater than Jonas is here.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and, behold, a greater than Solomon is here.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man, he walketh through dry places, seeking rest, and findeth none.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then he saith, I will return into my house from whence I came out; and when he is come, he findeth it empty, swept, and garnished.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then goeth he, and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself, and they enter in and dwell there: and the last state of that man is worse than the first. Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: While he yet talked to the people, behold, his mother and his brethren stood without, desiring to speak with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then one said unto him, Behold, thy mother and thy brethren stand without, desiring to speak with thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered and said unto him that told him, Who is my mother? and who are my brethren?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples, and said, Behold my mother and my brethren!

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven, the same is my brother, and sister, and mother.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The same day went Jesus out of the house, and sat by the sea side.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him, so that he went into a ship, and sat; and the whole multitude stood on the shore.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he spake many things unto them in parables, saying, Behold, a sower went forth to sow;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he sowed, some seeds fell by the way side, and the fowls came and devoured them up:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Some fell upon stony places, where they had not much earth: and forthwith they sprung up, because they had no deepness of earth:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the sun was up, they were scorched; and because they had no root, they withered away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some fell among thorns; and the thorns sprung up, and choked them:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But other fell into good ground, and brought forth fruit, some an hundredfold, some sixtyfold, some thirtyfold.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who hath ears to hear, let him hear.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the disciples came, and said unto him, Why speakest thou unto them in parables?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered and said unto them, Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven, but to them it is not given.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For whosoever hath, to him shall be given, and he shall have more abundance: but whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken away even that he hath.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore speak I to them in parables: because they seeing see not; and hearing they hear not, neither do they understand.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias, which saith, By hearing ye shall hear, and shall not understand; and seeing ye shall see, and shall not perceive:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For this people's heart is waxed gross, and their ears are dull of hearing, and their eyes they have closed; lest at any time they should see with their eyes, and hear with their ears, and should understand with their heart, and should be converted, and I should heal them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But blessed are your eyes, for they see: and your ears, for they hear.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For verily I say unto you, That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see, and have not seen them; and to hear those things which ye hear, and have not heard them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom, and understandeth it not, then cometh the wicked one, and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart. This is he which received seed by the way side.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that received the seed into stony places, the same is he that heareth the word, and anon with joy receiveth it;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Yet hath he not root in himself, but dureth for a while: for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word, by and by he is offended.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word; and the care of this world, and the deceitfulness of riches, choke the word, and he becometh unfruitful.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word, and understandeth it; which also beareth fruit, and bringeth forth, some an hundredfold, some sixty, some thirty.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But while men slept, his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat, and went his way.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the blade was sprung up, and brought forth fruit, then appeared the tares also.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him, Sir, didst not thou sow good seed in thy field? from whence then hath it tares?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He said unto them, An enemy hath done this. The servants said unto him, Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he said, Nay; lest while ye gather up the tares, ye root up also the wheat with them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Let both grow together until the harvest: and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers, Gather ye together first the tares, and bind them in bundles to burn them: but gather the wheat into my barn.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed, which a man took, and sowed in his field:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which indeed is the least of all seeds: but when it is grown, it is the greatest among herbs, and becometh a tree, so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Another parable spake he unto them; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven, which a woman took, and hid in three measures of meal, till the whole was leavened.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables; and without a parable spake he not unto them:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, saying, I will open my mouth in parables; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus sent the multitude away, and went into the house: and his disciples came unto him, saying, Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered and said unto them, He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The field is the world; the good seed are the children of the kingdom; but the tares are the children of the wicked one;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The enemy that sowed them is the devil; the harvest is the end of the world; and the reapers are the angels.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire; so shall it be in the end of this world.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Son of man shall send forth his angels, and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend, and them which do iniquity;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire: there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father. Who hath ears to hear, let him hear.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field; the which when a man hath found, he hideth, and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath, and buyeth that field.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man, seeking goodly pearls:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who, when he had found one pearl of great price, went and sold all that he had, and bought it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net, that was cast into the sea, and gathered of every kind:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which, when it was full, they drew to shore, and sat down, and gathered the good into vessels, but cast the bad away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So shall it be at the end of the world: the angels shall come forth, and sever the wicked from among the just,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire: there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto them, Have ye understood all these things? They say unto him, Yea, Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said he unto them, Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that when Jesus had finished these parables, he departed thence.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was come into his own country, he taught them in their synagogue, insomuch that they were astonished, and said, Whence hath this man this wisdom, and these mighty works?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Is not this the carpenter's son? is not his mother called Mary? and his brethren, James, and Joses, and Simon, and Judas?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his sisters, are they not all with us? Whence then hath this man all these things?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were offended in him. But Jesus said unto them, A prophet is not without honour, save in his own country, and in his own house.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto his servants, This is John the Baptist; he is risen from the dead; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For Herod had laid hold on John, and bound him, and put him in prison for Herodias' sake, his brother Philip's wife.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For John said unto him, It is not lawful for thee to have her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he would have put him to death, he feared the multitude, because they counted him as a prophet.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when Herod's birthday was kept, the daughter of Herodias danced before them, and pleased Herod.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And she, being before instructed of her mother, said, Give me here John Baptist's head in a charger.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the king was sorry: nevertheless for the oath's sake, and them which sat with him at meat, he commanded it to be given her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he sent, and beheaded John in the prison.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his head was brought in a charger, and given to the damsel: and she brought it to her mother.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his disciples came, and took up the body, and buried it, and went and told Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus heard of it, he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart: and when the people had heard thereof, they followed him on foot out of the cities.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus went forth, and saw a great multitude, and was moved with compassion toward them, and he healed their sick.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when it was evening, his disciples came to him, saying, This is a desert place, and the time is now past; send the multitude away, that they may go into the villages, and buy themselves victuals.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus said unto them, They need not depart; give ye them to eat.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they say unto him, We have here but five loaves, and two fishes.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He said, Bring them hither to me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass, and took the five loaves, and the two fishes, and looking up to heaven, he blessed, and brake, and gave the loaves to his disciples, and the disciples to the multitude.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they did all eat, and were filled: and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men, beside women and children.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship, and to go before him unto the other side, while he sent the multitudes away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had sent the multitudes away, he went up into a mountain apart to pray: and when the evening was come, he was there alone.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea, tossed with waves: for the wind was contrary.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them, walking on the sea.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea, they were troubled, saying, It is a spirit; and they cried out for fear.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But straightway Jesus spake unto them, saying, Be of good cheer; it is I; be not afraid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Peter answered him and said, Lord, if it be thou, bid me come unto thee on the water.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, Come. And when Peter was come down out of the ship, he walked on the water, to go to Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when he saw the wind boisterous, he was afraid; and beginning to sink, he cried, saying, Lord, save me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand, and caught him, and said unto him, O thou of little faith, wherefore didst thou doubt?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come into the ship, the wind ceased.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him, saying, Of a truth thou art the Son of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were gone over, they came into the land of Gennesaret.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him, they sent out into all that country round about, and brought unto him all that were diseased;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment: and as many as touched were made perfectly whole.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees, which were of Jerusalem, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered and said unto them, Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For God commanded, saying, Honour thy father and mother: and, He that curseth father or mother, let him die the death.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But ye say, Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother, It is a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And honour not his father or his mother, he shall be free. Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye hypocrites, well did Esaias prophesy of you, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth, and honoureth me with their lips; but their heart is far from me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But in vain they do worship me, teaching for doctrines the commandments of men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he called the multitude, and said unto them, Hear, and understand:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man; but that which cometh out of the mouth, this defileth a man.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came his disciples, and said unto him, Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended, after they heard this saying?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered and said, Every plant, which my heavenly Father hath not planted, shall be rooted up.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Let them alone: they be blind leaders of the blind. And if the blind lead the blind, both shall fall into the ditch.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then answered Peter and said unto him, Declare unto us this parable.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said, Are ye also yet without understanding?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Do not ye yet understand, that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly, and is cast out into the draught?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart; and they defile the man.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts, murders, adulteries, fornications, thefts, false witness, blasphemies:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These are the things which defile a man: but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus went thence, and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts, and cried unto him, saying, Have mercy on me, O Lord, thou Son of David; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered her not a word. And his disciples came and besought him, saying, Send her away; for she crieth after us.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered and said, I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came she and worshipped him, saying, Lord, help me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered and said, It is not meet to take the children's bread, and to cast it to dogs.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And she said, Truth, Lord: yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters' table.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus answered and said unto her, O woman, great is thy faith: be it unto thee even as thou wilt. And her daughter was made whole from that very hour.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus departed from thence, and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee; and went up into a mountain, and sat down there.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And great multitudes came unto him, having with them those that were lame, blind, dumb, maimed, and many others, and cast them down at Jesus' feet; and he healed them:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Insomuch that the multitude wondered, when they saw the dumb to speak, the maimed to be whole, the lame to walk, and the blind to see: and they glorified the God of Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him, and said, I have compassion on the multitude, because they continue with me now three days, and have nothing to eat: and I will not send them away fasting, lest they faint in the way.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his disciples say unto him, Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness, as to fill so great a multitude?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus saith unto them, How many loaves have ye? And they said, Seven, and a few little fishes.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes, and gave thanks, and brake them, and gave to his disciples, and the disciples to the multitude.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they did all eat, and were filled: and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they that did eat were four thousand men, beside women and children.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he sent away the multitude, and took ship, and came into the coasts of Magdala.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came, and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered and said unto them, When it is evening, ye say, It will be fair weather: for the sky is red.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in the morning, It will be foul weather to day: for the sky is red and lowring. O ye hypocrites, ye can discern the face of the sky; but can ye not discern the signs of the times?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign; and there shall no sign be given unto it, but the sign of the prophet Jonas. And he left them, and departed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when his disciples were come to the other side, they had forgotten to take bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus said unto them, Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they reasoned among themselves, saying, It is because we have taken no bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which when Jesus perceived, he said unto them, O ye of little faith, why reason ye among yourselves, because ye have brought no bread?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Do ye not yet understand, neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand, and how many baskets ye took up?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand, and how many baskets ye took up?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread, that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread, but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying, Whom do men say that I the Son of man am?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said, Some say that thou art John the Baptist: some, Elias; and others, Jeremias, or one of the prophets.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Simon Peter answered and said, Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Blessed art thou, Simon Bar-jona: for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee, but my Father which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I say also unto thee, That thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples, how that he must go unto Jerusalem, and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be killed, and be raised again the third day.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Peter took him, and began to rebuke him, saying, Be it far from thee, Lord: this shall not be unto thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he turned, and said unto Peter, Get thee behind me, Satan: thou art an offence unto me: for thou savourest not the things that be of God, but those that be of men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it: and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For what is a man profited, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels; and then he shall reward every man according to his works.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, There be some standing here, which shall not taste of death, till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter, James, and John his brother, and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And was transfigured before them: and his face did shine as the sun, and his raiment was white as the light.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then answered Peter, and said unto Jesus, Lord, it is good for us to be here: if thou wilt, let us make here three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: While he yet spake, behold, a bright cloud overshadowed them: and behold a voice out of the cloud, which said, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased; hear ye him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the disciples heard it, they fell on their face, and were sore afraid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus came and touched them, and said, Arise, and be not afraid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had lifted up their eyes, they saw no man, save Jesus only.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they came down from the mountain, Jesus charged them, saying, Tell the vision to no man, until the Son of man be risen again from the dead.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his disciples asked him, saying, Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Elias truly shall first come, and restore all things.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, That Elias is come already, and they knew him not, but have done unto him whatsoever they listed. Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come to the multitude, there came to him a certain man, kneeling down to him, and saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Lord, have mercy on my son: for he is lunatic, and sore vexed: for ofttimes he falleth into the fire, and oft into the water.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I brought him to thy disciples, and they could not cure him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus answered and said, O faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you? how long shall I suffer you? bring him hither to me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus rebuked the devil; and he departed out of him: and the child was cured from that very hour.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart, and said, Why could not we cast him out?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said unto them, Because of your unbelief: for verily I say unto you, If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed, ye shall say unto this mountain, Remove hence to yonder place; and it shall remove; and nothing shall be impossible unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And while they abode in Galilee, Jesus said unto them, The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they shall kill him, and the third day he shall be raised again. And they were exceeding sorry.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come to Capernaum, they that received tribute money came to Peter, and said, Doth not your master pay tribute?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saith, Yes. And when he was come into the house, Jesus prevented him, saying, What thinkest thou, Simon? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute? of their own children, or of strangers?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Peter saith unto him, Of strangers. Jesus saith unto him, Then are the children free.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Notwithstanding, lest we should offend them, go thou to the sea, and cast an hook, and take up the fish that first cometh up; and when thou hast opened his mouth, thou shalt find a piece of money: that take, and give unto them for me and thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus, saying, Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus called a little child unto him, and set him in the midst of them,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said, Verily I say unto you, Except ye be converted, and become as little children, ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child, the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me, it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto the world because of offences! for it must needs be that offences come; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh!

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee, cut them off, and cast them from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed, rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if thine eye offend thee, pluck it out, and cast it from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye, rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones; for I say unto you, That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: How think ye? if a man have an hundred sheep, and one of them be gone astray, doth he not leave the ninety and nine, and goeth into the mountains, and seeketh that which is gone astray?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if so be that he find it, verily I say unto you, he rejoiceth more of that sheep, than of the ninety and nine which went not astray.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven, that one of these little ones should perish.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee, go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone: if he shall hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if he will not hear thee, then take with thee one or two more, that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if he shall neglect to hear them, tell it unto the church: but if he neglect to hear the church, let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king, which would take account of his servants.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had begun to reckon, one was brought unto him, which owed him ten thousand talents.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But forasmuch as he had not to pay, his lord commanded him to be sold, and his wife, and children, and all that he had, and payment to be made.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The servant therefore fell down, and worshipped him, saying, Lord, have patience with me, and I will pay thee all.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion, and loosed him, and forgave him the debt.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the same servant went out, and found one of his fellowservants, which owed him an hundred pence: and he laid hands on him, and took him by the throat, saying, Pay me that thou owest.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet, and besought him, saying, Have patience with me, and I will pay thee all.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he would not: but went and cast him into prison, till he should pay the debt.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So when his fellowservants saw what was done, they were very sorry, and came and told unto their lord all that was done.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then his lord, after that he had called him, said unto him, O thou wicked servant, I forgave thee all that debt, because thou desiredst me:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant, even as I had pity on thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his lord was wroth, and delivered him to the tormentors, till he should pay all that was due unto him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you, if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that when Jesus had finished these sayings, he departed from Galilee, and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And great multitudes followed him; and he healed them there.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Pharisees also came unto him, tempting him, and saying unto him, Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he answered and said unto them, Have ye not read, that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said, For this cause shall a man leave father and mother, and shall cleave to his wife: and they twain shall be one flesh?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore they are no more twain, but one flesh. What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They say unto him, Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement, and to put her away?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saith unto them, Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives: but from the beginning it was not so.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I say unto you, Whosoever shall put away his wife, except it be for fornication, and shall marry another, committeth adultery: and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: His disciples say unto him, If the case of the man be so with his wife, it is not good to marry.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he said unto them, All men cannot receive this saying, save they to whom it is given.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For there are some eunuchs, which were so born from their mother's womb: and there are some eunuchs, which were made eunuchs of men: and there be eunuchs, which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven's sake. He that is able to receive it, let him receive it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then were there brought unto him little children, that he should put his hands on them, and pray: and the disciples rebuked them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus said, Suffer little children, and forbid them not, to come unto me: for of such is the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he laid his hands on them, and departed thence.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, one came and said unto him, Good Master, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God: but if thou wilt enter into life, keep the commandments.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saith unto him, Which? Jesus said, Thou shalt do no murder, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Honour thy father and thy mother: and, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The young man saith unto him, All these things have I kept from my youth up: what lack I yet?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus said unto him, If thou wilt be perfect, go and sell that thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come and follow me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the young man heard that saying, he went away sorrowful: for he had great possessions.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And again I say unto you, It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When his disciples heard it, they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then answered Peter and said unto him, Behold, we have forsaken all, and followed thee; what shall we have therefore?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said unto them, Verily I say unto you, That ye which have followed me, in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory, ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And every one that hath forsaken houses, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my name's sake, shall receive an hundredfold, and shall inherit everlasting life.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But many that are first shall be last; and the last shall be first.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day, he sent them into his vineyard.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he went out about the third hour, and saw others standing idle in the marketplace,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto them; Go ye also into the vineyard, and whatsoever is right I will give you. And they went their way.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour, and did likewise.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And about the eleventh hour he went out, and found others standing idle, and saith unto them, Why stand ye here all the day idle?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They say unto him, Because no man hath hired us. He saith unto them, Go ye also into the vineyard; and whatsoever is right, that shall ye receive.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So when even was come, the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward, Call the labourers, and give them their hire, beginning from the last unto the first.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour, they received every man a penny.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the first came, they supposed that they should have received more; and they likewise received every man a penny.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had received it, they murmured against the goodman of the house,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, These last have wrought but one hour, and thou hast made them equal unto us, which have borne the burden and heat of the day.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered one of them, and said, Friend, I do thee no wrong: didst not thou agree with me for a penny?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Take that thine is, and go thy way: I will give unto this last, even as unto thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own? Is thine eye evil, because I am good?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So the last shall be first, and the first last: for many be called, but few chosen.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way, and said unto them,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold, we go up to Jerusalem; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes, and they shall condemn him to death,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock, and to scourge, and to crucify him: and the third day he shall rise again.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee's children with her sons, worshipping him, and desiring a certain thing of him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto her, What wilt thou? She saith unto him, Grant that these my two sons may sit, the one on thy right hand, and the other on the left, in thy kingdom.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus answered and said, Ye know not what ye ask. Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of, and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with? They say unto him, We are able.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he saith unto them, Ye shall drink indeed of my cup, and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with: but to sit on my right hand, and on my left, is not mine to give, but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the ten heard it, they were moved with indignation against the two brethren.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus called them unto him, and said, Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them, and they that are great exercise authority upon them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But it shall not be so among you: but whosoever will be great among you, let him be your minister;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whosoever will be chief among you, let him be your servant:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they departed from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, two blind men sitting by the way side, when they heard that Jesus passed by, cried out, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou Son of David.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the multitude rebuked them, because they should hold their peace: but they cried the more, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou Son of David.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus stood still, and called them, and said, What will ye that I shall do unto you?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They say unto him, Lord, that our eyes may be opened.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So Jesus had compassion on them, and touched their eyes: and immediately their eyes received sight, and they followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem, and were come to Bethphage, unto the mount of Olives, then sent Jesus two disciples,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying unto them, Go into the village over against you, and straightway ye shall find an ass tied, and a colt with her: loose them, and bring them unto me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if any man say ought unto you, ye shall say, The Lord hath need of them; and straightway he will send them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Tell ye the daughter of Sion, Behold, thy King cometh unto thee, meek, and sitting upon an ass, and a colt the foal of an ass.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the disciples went, and did as Jesus commanded them,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And brought the ass, and the colt, and put on them their clothes, and they set him thereon.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way; others cut down branches from the trees, and strawed them in the way.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the multitudes that went before, and that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna to the Son of David: Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord; Hosanna in the highest.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was come into Jerusalem, all the city was moved, saying, Who is this?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the multitude said, This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus went into the temple of God, and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto them, It is written, My house shall be called the house of prayer; but ye have made it a den of thieves.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple; and he healed them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did, and the children crying in the temple, and saying, Hosanna to the Son of David; they were sore displeased,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto him, Hearest thou what these say? And Jesus saith unto them, Yea; have ye never read, Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he left them, and went out of the city into Bethany; and he lodged there.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now in the morning as he returned into the city, he hungered.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he saw a fig tree in the way, he came to it, and found nothing thereon, but leaves only, and said unto it, Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever. And presently the fig tree withered away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the disciples saw it, they marvelled, saying, How soon is the fig tree withered away!

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto them, Verily I say unto you, If ye have faith, and doubt not, ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree, but also if ye shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; it shall be done.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was come into the temple, the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching, and said, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I also will ask you one thing, which if ye tell me, I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The baptism of John, whence was it? from heaven, or of men? And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say unto us, Why did ye not then believe him?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if we shall say, Of men; we fear the people; for all hold John as a prophet.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they answered Jesus, and said, We cannot tell. And he said unto them, Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But what think ye? A certain man had two sons; and he came to the first, and said, Son, go work to day in my vineyard.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered and said, I will not: but afterward he repented, and went.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he came to the second, and said likewise. And he answered and said, I go, sir: and went not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whether of them twain did the will of his father? They say unto him, The first. Jesus saith unto them, Verily I say unto you, That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness, and ye believed him not: but the publicans and the harlots believed him: and ye, when ye had seen it, repented not afterward, that ye might believe him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Hear another parable: There was a certain householder, which planted a vineyard, and hedged it round about, and digged a winepress in it, and built a tower, and let it out to husbandmen, and went into a far country:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the time of the fruit drew near, he sent his servants to the husbandmen, that they might receive the fruits of it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the husbandmen took his servants, and beat one, and killed another, and stoned another.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again, he sent other servants more than the first: and they did unto them likewise.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But last of all he sent unto them his son, saying, They will reverence my son.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the husbandmen saw the son, they said among themselves, This is the heir; come, let us kill him, and let us seize on his inheritance.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they caught him, and cast him out of the vineyard, and slew him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh, what will he do unto those husbandmen?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They say unto him, He will miserably destroy those wicked men, and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen, which shall render him the fruits in their seasons.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto them, Did ye never read in the scriptures, The stone which the builders rejected, the same is become the head of the corner: this is the Lord's doing, and it is marvellous in our eyes?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore say I unto you, The kingdom of God shall be taken from you, and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken: but on whomsoever it shall fall, it will grind him to powder.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables, they perceived that he spake of them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when they sought to lay hands on him, they feared the multitude, because they took him for a prophet.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables, and said,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king, which made a marriage for his son,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding: and they would not come.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again, he sent forth other servants, saying, Tell them which are bidden, Behold, I have prepared my dinner: my oxen and my fatlings are killed, and all things are ready: come unto the marriage.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they made light of it, and went their ways, one to his farm, another to his merchandise:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the remnant took his servants, and entreated them spitefully, and slew them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the king heard thereof, he was wroth: and he sent forth his armies, and destroyed those murderers, and burned up their city.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith he to his servants, The wedding is ready, but they which were bidden were not worthy.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Go ye therefore into the highways, and as many as ye shall find, bid to the marriage.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So those servants went out into the highways, and gathered together all as many as they found, both bad and good: and the wedding was furnished with guests.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the king came in to see the guests, he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he saith unto him, Friend, how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment? And he was speechless.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the king to the servants, Bind him hand and foot, and take him away, and cast him into outer darkness; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
