column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For many are called, but few are chosen.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then went the Pharisees, and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians, saying, Master, we know that thou art true, and teachest the way of God in truth, neither carest thou for any man: for thou regardest not the person of men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Tell us therefore, What thinkest thou? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar, or not?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus perceived their wickedness, and said, Why tempt ye me, ye hypocrites?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Shew me the tribute money. And they brought unto him a penny.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he saith unto them, Whose is this image and superscription?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They say unto him, Caesar's. Then saith he unto them, Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar's; and unto God the things that are God's.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they had heard these words, they marvelled, and left him, and went their way.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The same day came to him the Sadducees, which say that there is no resurrection, and asked him,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, Master, Moses said, If a man die, having no children, his brother shall marry his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now there were with us seven brethren: and the first, when he had married a wife, deceased, and, having no issue, left his wife unto his brother:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Likewise the second also, and the third, unto the seventh.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And last of all the woman died also.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven? for they all had her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto them, Ye do err, not knowing the scriptures, nor the power of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For in the resurrection they neither marry, nor are given in marriage, but are as the angels of God in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But as touching the resurrection of the dead, have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob? God is not the God of the dead, but of the living.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the multitude heard this, they were astonished at his doctrine.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence, they were gathered together.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then one of them, which was a lawyer, asked him a question, tempting him, and saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Master, which is the great commandment in the law?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus said unto him, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is the first and great commandment.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the second is like unto it, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: While the Pharisees were gathered together, Jesus asked them,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, What think ye of Christ? whose son is he? They say unto him, The Son of David.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saith unto them, How then doth David in spirit call him Lord, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Lord said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand, till I make thine enemies thy footstool?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If David then call him Lord, how is he his son?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And no man was able to answer him a word, neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then spake Jesus to the multitude, and to his disciples,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses' seat:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe, that observe and do; but do not ye after their works: for they say, and do not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne, and lay them on men's shoulders; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But all their works they do for to be seen of men: they make broad their phylacteries, and enlarge the borders of their garments,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts, and the chief seats in the synagogues,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And greetings in the markets, and to be called of men, Rabbi, Rabbi.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But be not ye called Rabbi: for one is your Master, even Christ; and all ye are brethren.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And call no man your father upon the earth: for one is your Father, which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Neither be ye called masters: for one is your Master, even Christ.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men: for ye neither go in yourselves, neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayer: therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte, and when he is made, ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto you, ye blind guides, which say, Whosoever shall swear by the temple, it is nothing; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple, he is a debtor!

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye fools and blind: for whether is greater, the gold, or the temple that sanctifieth the gold?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, Whosoever shall swear by the altar, it is nothing; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it, he is guilty.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye fools and blind: for whether is greater, the gift, or the altar that sanctifieth the gift?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar, sweareth by it, and by all things thereon.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whoso shall swear by the temple, sweareth by it, and by him that dwelleth therein.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he that shall swear by heaven, sweareth by the throne of God, and by him that sitteth thereon.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin, and have omitted the weightier matters of the law, judgment, mercy, and faith: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye blind guides, which strain at a gnat, and swallow a camel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter, but within they are full of extortion and excess.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thou blind Pharisee, cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter, that the outside of them may be clean also.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres, which indeed appear beautiful outward, but are within full of dead men's bones, and of all uncleanness.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men, but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! because ye build the tombs of the prophets, and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And say, If we had been in the days of our fathers, we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves, that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye serpents, ye generation of vipers, how can ye escape the damnation of hell?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore, behold, I send unto you prophets, and wise men, and scribes: and some of them ye shall kill and crucify; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues, and persecute them from city to city:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth, from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias, whom ye slew between the temple and the altar.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, All these things shall come upon this generation.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, thou that killest the prophets, and stonest them which are sent unto thee, how often would I have gathered thy children together, even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings, and ye would not!

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold, your house is left unto you desolate.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I say unto you, Ye shall not see me henceforth, till ye shall say, Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus went out, and departed from the temple: and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said unto them, See ye not all these things? verily I say unto you, There shall not be left here one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives, the disciples came unto him privately, saying, Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign of thy coming, and of the end of the world?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Take heed that no man deceive you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all these things must come to pass, but the end is not yet.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be famines, and pestilences, and earthquakes, in divers places.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All these are the beginning of sorrows.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted, and shall kill you: and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name's sake.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And then shall many be offended, and shall betray one another, and shall hate one another.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many false prophets shall rise, and shall deceive many.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And because iniquity shall abound, the love of many shall wax cold.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, stand in the holy place, (whoso readeth, let him understand:)

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter, neither on the sabbath day:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For then shall be great tribulation, such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time, no, nor ever shall be.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved: but for the elect's sake those days shall be shortened.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then if any man shall say unto you, Lo, here is Christ, or there; believe it not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For there shall arise false Christs, and false prophets, and shall shew great signs and wonders; insomuch that, if it were possible, they shall deceive the very elect.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold, I have told you before.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore if they shall say unto you, Behold, he is in the desert; go not forth: behold, he is in the secret chambers; believe it not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as the lightning cometh out of the east, and shineth even unto the west; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For wheresoever the carcase is, there will the eagles be gathered together.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light, and the stars shall fall from heaven, and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven: and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn, and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet, and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from one end of heaven to the other.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When his branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is nigh:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So likewise ye, when ye shall see all these things, know that it is near, even at the doors.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass, till all these things be fulfilled.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But of that day and hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels of heaven, but my Father only.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But as the days of Noe were, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day that Noe entered into the ark,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And knew not until the flood came, and took them all away; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall two be in the field; the one shall be taken, and the other left.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Two women shall be grinding at the mill; the one shall be taken, and the other left.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Watch therefore: for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But know this, that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come, he would have watched, and would not have suffered his house to be broken up.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore be ye also ready: for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who then is a faithful and wise servant, whom his lord hath made ruler over his household, to give them meat in due season?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed is that servant, whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, That he shall make him ruler over all his goods.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants, and to eat and drink with the drunken;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him, and in an hour that he is not aware of,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And shall cut him asunder, and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins, which took their lamps, and went forth to meet the bridegroom.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And five of them were wise, and five were foolish.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They that were foolish took their lamps, and took no oil with them:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And at midnight there was a cry made, Behold, the bridegroom cometh; go ye out to meet him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then all those virgins arose, and trimmed their lamps.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the foolish said unto the wise, Give us of your oil; for our lamps are gone out.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the wise answered, saying, Not so; lest there be not enough for us and you: but go ye rather to them that sell, and buy for yourselves.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And while they went to buy, the bridegroom came; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage: and the door was shut.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Afterward came also the other virgins, saying, Lord, Lord, open to us.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he answered and said, Verily I say unto you, I know you not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country, who called his own servants, and delivered unto them his goods.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And unto one he gave five talents, to another two, and to another one; to every man according to his several ability; and straightway took his journey.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same, and made them other five talents.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And likewise he that had received two, he also gained other two.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth, and hid his lord's money.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents, saying, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me five talents: behold, I have gained beside them five talents more.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: His lord said unto him, Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He also that had received two talents came and said, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me two talents: behold, I have gained two other talents beside them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then he which had received the one talent came and said, Lord, I knew thee that thou art an hard man, reaping where thou hast not sown, and gathering where thou hast not strawed:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I was afraid, and went and hid thy talent in the earth: lo, there thou hast that is thine.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: His lord answered and said unto him, Thou wicked and slothful servant, thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not, and gather where I have not strawed:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers, and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Take therefore the talent from him, and give it unto him which hath ten talents.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For unto every one that hath shall be given, and he shall have abundance: but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And before him shall be gathered all nations: and he shall separate them one from another, as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand, but the goats on the left.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Or when saw we thee sick, or in prison, and came unto thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand, Depart from me, ye cursed, into everlasting fire, prepared for the devil and his angels:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I was an hungred, and ye gave me no meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me no drink:

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I was a stranger, and ye took me not in: naked, and ye clothed me not: sick, and in prison, and ye visited me not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall they also answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, or athirst, or a stranger, or naked, or sick, or in prison, and did not minister unto thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall he answer them, saying, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these, ye did it not to me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment: but the righteous into life eternal.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, when Jesus had finished all these sayings, he said unto his disciples,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover, and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then assembled together the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders of the people, unto the palace of the high priest, who was called Caiaphas,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty, and kill him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they said, Not on the feast day, lest there be an uproar among the people.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when Jesus was in Bethany, in the house of Simon the leper,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment, and poured it on his head, as he sat at meat.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when his disciples saw it, they had indignation, saying, To what purpose is this waste?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For this ointment might have been sold for much, and given to the poor.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus understood it, he said unto them, Why trouble ye the woman? for she hath wrought a good work upon me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For ye have the poor always with you; but me ye have not always.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body, she did it for my burial.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world, there shall also this, that this woman hath done, be told for a memorial of her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then one of the twelve, called Judas Iscariot, went unto the chief priests,

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto them, What will ye give me, and I will deliver him unto you? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus, saying unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, Go into the city to such a man, and say unto him, The Master saith, My time is at hand; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them; and they made ready the passover.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when the even was come, he sat down with the twelve.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they did eat, he said, Verily I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were exceeding sorrowful, and began every one of them to say unto him, Lord, is it I?

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he answered and said, He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish, the same shall betray me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him: but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! it had been good for that man if he had not been born.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Judas, which betrayed him, answered and said, Master, is it I? He said unto him, Thou hast said.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they were eating, Jesus took bread, and blessed it, and brake it, and gave it to the disciples, and said, Take, eat; this is my body.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and gave it to them, saying, Drink ye all of it;

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For this is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many for the remission of sins.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I say unto you, I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine, until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father's kingdom.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had sung an hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith Jesus unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad.

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew

column8: The Gospel According to St Matthew
