column17: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But take ye heed: behold, I have foretold you all things.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But in those days, after that tribulation, the sun shall be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light,

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the stars of heaven shall fall, and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And then shall he send his angels, and shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When her branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is near:

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So ye in like manner, when ye shall see these things come to pass, know that it is nigh, even at the doors.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, that this generation shall not pass, till all these things be done.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels which are in heaven, neither the Son, but the Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey, who left his house, and gave authority to his servants, and to every man his work, and commanded the porter to watch.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning:

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After two days was the feast of the passover, and of unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft, and put him to death.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they said, Not on the feast day, lest there be an uproar of the people.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper, as he sat at meat, there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious; and she brake the box, and poured it on his head.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: She hath done what she could: she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world, this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they heard it, they were glad, and promised to give him money. And he sought how he might conveniently betray him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples, and saith unto them, Go ye into the city, and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water: follow him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And wheresoever he shall go in, say ye to the goodman of the house, The Master saith, Where is the guestchamber, where I shall eat the passover with my disciples?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared: there make ready for us.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his disciples went forth, and came into the city, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they sat and did eat, Jesus said, Verily I say unto you, One of you which eateth with me shall betray me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they began to be sorrowful, and to say unto him one by one, Is it I? and another said, Is it I?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he answered and said unto them, It is one of the twelve, that dippeth with me in the dish.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Son of man indeed goeth, as it is written of him: but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! good were it for that man if he had never been born.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they did eat, Jesus took bread, and blessed, and brake it, and gave to them, and said, Take, eat: this is my body.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave it to them: and they all drank of it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine, until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had sung an hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus saith unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But after that I am risen, I will go before you into Galilee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Peter said unto him, Although all shall be offended, yet will not I.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus saith unto him, Verily I say unto thee, That this day, even in this night, before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he spake the more vehemently, If I should die with thee, I will not deny thee in any wise. Likewise also said they all.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane: and he saith to his disciples, Sit ye here, while I shall pray.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John, and began to be sore amazed, and to be very heavy;

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saith unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death: tarry ye here, and watch.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he went forward a little, and fell on the ground, and prayed that, if it were possible, the hour might pass from him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he cometh, and findeth them sleeping, and saith unto Peter, Simon, sleepest thou? couldest not thou watch one hour?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And again he went away, and prayed, and spake the same words.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he returned, he found them asleep again, (for their eyes were heavy,) neither wist they what to answer him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he cometh the third time, and saith unto them, Sleep on now, and take your rest: it is enough, the hour is come; behold, the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Rise up, let us go; lo, he that betrayeth me is at hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And immediately, while he yet spake, cometh Judas, one of the twelve, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he that betrayed him had given them a token, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he; take him, and lead him away safely.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as soon as he was come, he goeth straightway to him, and saith, Master, master; and kissed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they laid their hands on him, and took him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And one of them that stood by drew a sword, and smote a servant of the high priest, and cut off his ear.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I was daily with you in the temple teaching, and ye took me not: but the scriptures must be fulfilled.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they all forsook him, and fled.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there followed him a certain young man, having a linen cloth cast about his naked body; and the young men laid hold on him:

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he left the linen cloth, and fled from them naked.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they led Jesus away to the high priest: and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Peter followed him afar off, even into the palace of the high priest: and he sat with the servants, and warmed himself at the fire.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: We heard him say, I will destroy this temple that is made with hands, and within three days I will build another made without hands.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But neither so did their witness agree together.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he held his peace, and answered nothing. Again the high priest asked him, and said unto him, Art thou the Christ, the Son of the Blessed?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said, I am: and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the high priest rent his clothes, and saith, What need we any further witnesses?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye have heard the blasphemy: what think ye? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some began to spit on him, and to cover his face, and to buffet him, and to say unto him, Prophesy: and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest:

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when she saw Peter warming himself, she looked upon him, and said, And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he denied, saying, I know not, neither understand I what thou sayest. And he went out into the porch; and the cock crew.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a maid saw him again, and began to say to them that stood by, This is one of them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he denied it again. And a little after, they that stood by said again to Peter, Surely thou art one of them: for thou art a Galilaean, and thy speech agreeth thereto.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he began to curse and to swear, saying, I know not this man of whom ye speak.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the second time the cock crew. And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him, Before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice. And when he thought thereon, he wept.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council, and bound Jesus, and carried him away, and delivered him to Pilate.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Pilate asked him, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answering said unto him, Thou sayest it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the chief priests accused him of many things: but he answered nothing.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus yet answered nothing; so that Pilate marvelled.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner, whomsoever they desired.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there was one named Barabbas, which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him, who had committed murder in the insurrection.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Pilate answered them, saying, Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the chief priests moved the people, that he should rather release Barabbas unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Pilate answered and said again unto them, What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they cried out again, Crucify him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Pilate said unto them, Why, what evil hath he done? And they cried out the more exceedingly, Crucify him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the soldiers led him away into the hall, called Praetorium; and they call together the whole band.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they clothed him with purple, and plaited a crown of thorns, and put it about his head,

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And began to salute him, Hail, King of the Jews!

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they smote him on the head with a reed, and did spit upon him, and bowing their knees worshipped him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian, who passed by, coming out of the country, the father of Alexander and Rufus, to bear his cross.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha, which is, being interpreted, The place of a skull.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh: but he received it not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it was the third hour, and they crucified him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the superscription of his accusation was written over, The King of the Jews.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And with him they crucify two thieves; the one on his right hand, and the other on his left.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the scripture was fulfilled, which saith, And he was numbered with the transgressors.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they that passed by railed on him, wagging their heads, and saying, Ah, thou that destroyest the temple, and buildest it in three days,

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Save thyself, and come down from the cross.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes, He saved others; himself he cannot save.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross, that we may see and believe. And they that were crucified with him reviled him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the sixth hour was come, there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some of them that stood by, when they heard it, said, Behold, he calleth Elias.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And one ran and filled a sponge full of vinegar, and put it on a reed, and gave him to drink, saying, Let alone; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus cried with a loud voice, and gave up the ghost.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the centurion, which stood over against him, saw that he so cried out, and gave up the ghost, he said, Truly this man was the Son of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There were also women looking on afar off: among whom was Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses, and Salome;

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (Who also, when he was in Galilee, followed him, and ministered unto him;) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now when the even was come, because it was the preparation, that is, the day before the sabbath,

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Joseph of Arimathaea, an honourable counsellor, which also waited for the kingdom of God, came, and went in boldly unto Pilate, and craved the body of Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead: and calling unto him the centurion, he asked him whether he had been any while dead.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he knew it of the centurion, he gave the body to Joseph.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he bought fine linen, and took him down, and wrapped him in the linen, and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock, and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And very early in the morning the first day of the week, they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said among themselves, Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre?

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they looked, they saw that the stone was rolled away: for it was very great.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And entering into the sepulchre, they saw a young man sitting on the right side, clothed in a long white garment; and they were affrighted.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he saith unto them, Be not affrighted: Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth, which was crucified: he is risen; he is not here: behold the place where they laid him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But go your way, tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee: there shall ye see him, as he said unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they went out quickly, and fled from the sepulchre; for they trembled and were amazed: neither said they any thing to any man; for they were afraid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, out of whom he had cast seven devils.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And she went and told them that had been with him, as they mourned and wept.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they, when they had heard that he was alive, and had been seen of her, believed not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them, as they walked, and went into the country.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they went and told it unto the residue: neither believed they them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues;

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They shall take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing, it shall not hurt them; they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them, he was received up into heaven, and sat on the right hand of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Mark
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they went forth, and preached every where, the Lord working with them, and confirming the word with signs following. Amen.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Even as they delivered them unto us, which from the beginning were eyewitnesses, and ministers of the word;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: It seemed good to me also, having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first, to write unto thee in order, most excellent Theophilus,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things, wherein thou hast been instructed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There was in the days of Herod, the king of Judaea, a certain priest named Zacharias, of the course of Abia: and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron, and her name was Elisabeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were both righteous before God, walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they had no child, because that Elisabeth was barren, and they both were now well stricken in years.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that while he executed the priest's office before God in the order of his course,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: According to the custom of the priest's office, his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Zacharias saw him, he was troubled, and fear fell upon him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the angel said unto him, Fear not, Zacharias: for thy prayer is heard; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son, and thou shalt call his name John.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And thou shalt have joy and gladness; and many shall rejoice at his birth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord, and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost, even from his mother's womb.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias, to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children, and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Zacharias said unto the angel, Whereby shall I know this? for I am an old man, and my wife well stricken in years.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the angel answering said unto him, I am Gabriel, that stand in the presence of God; and am sent to speak unto thee, and to shew thee these glad tidings.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, thou shalt be dumb, and not able to speak, until the day that these things shall be performed, because thou believest not my words, which shall be fulfilled in their season.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the people waited for Zacharias, and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he came out, he could not speak unto them: and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple: for he beckoned unto them, and remained speechless.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that, as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished, he departed to his own house.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived, and hid herself five months, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me, to take away my reproach among men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee, named Nazareth,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph, of the house of David; and the virgin's name was Mary.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the angel came in unto her, and said, Hail, thou that art highly favoured, the Lord is with thee: blessed art thou among women.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when she saw him, she was troubled at his saying, and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the angel said unto her, Fear not, Mary: for thou hast found favour with God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, thou shalt conceive in thy womb, and bring forth a son, and shalt call his name Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He shall be great, and shall be called the Son of the Highest: and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever; and of his kingdom there shall be no end.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Mary unto the angel, How shall this be, seeing I know not a man?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the angel answered and said unto her, The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, thy cousin Elisabeth, she hath also conceived a son in her old age: and this is the sixth month with her, who was called barren.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For with God nothing shall be impossible.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Mary said, Behold the handmaid of the Lord; be it unto me according to thy word. And the angel departed from her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Mary arose in those days, and went into the hill country with haste, into a city of Juda;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And entered into the house of Zacharias, and saluted Elisabeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that, when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary, the babe leaped in her womb; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And she spake out with a loud voice, and said, Blessed art thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whence is this to me, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For, lo, as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears, the babe leaped in my womb for joy.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Mary said, My soul doth magnify the Lord,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden: for, behold, from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things; and holy is his name.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He hath shewed strength with his arm; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He hath put down the mighty from their seats, and exalted them of low degree.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He hath filled the hungry with good things; and the rich he hath sent empty away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He hath holpen his servant Israel, in remembrance of his mercy;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As he spake to our fathers, to Abraham, and to his seed for ever.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Mary abode with her about three months, and returned to her own house.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now Elisabeth's full time came that she should be delivered; and she brought forth a son.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her; and they rejoiced with her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child; and they called him Zacharias, after the name of his father.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his mother answered and said, Not so; but he shall be called John.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said unto her, There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they made signs to his father, how he would have him called.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he asked for a writing table, and wrote, saying, His name is John. And they marvelled all.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his mouth was opened immediately, and his tongue loosed, and he spake, and praised God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them: and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts, saying, What manner of child shall this be! And the hand of the Lord was with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost, and prophesied, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel; for he hath visited and redeemed his people,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets, which have been since the world began:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That we should be saved from our enemies, and from the hand of all that hate us;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers, and to remember his holy covenant;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That he would grant unto us, that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In holiness and righteousness before him, all the days of our life.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And thou, child, shalt be called the prophet of the Highest: for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Through the tender mercy of our God; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, to guide our feet into the way of peace.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass in those days, that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus, that all the world should be taxed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria.)

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all went to be taxed, every one into his own city.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Judaea, unto the city of David, which is called Bethlehem; (because he was of the house and lineage of David:)

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife, being great with child.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And so it was, that, while they were there, the days were accomplished that she should be delivered.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And she brought forth her firstborn son, and wrapped him in swaddling clothes, and laid him in a manger; because there was no room for them in the inn.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field, keeping watch over their flock by night.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, lo, the angel of the Lord came upon them, and the glory of the Lord shone round about them: and they were sore afraid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the angel said unto them, Fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy, which shall be to all people.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this shall be a sign unto you; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes, lying in a manger.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God, and saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, as the angels were gone away from them into heaven, the shepherds said one to another, Let us now go even unto Bethlehem, and see this thing which is come to pass, which the Lord hath made known unto us.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they came with haste, and found Mary, and Joseph, and the babe lying in a manger.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had seen it, they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Mary kept all these things, and pondered them in her heart.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen, as it was told unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child, his name was called Jesus, which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished, they brought him to Jerusalem, to present him to the Lord;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (As it is written in the law of the Lord, Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord;)

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord, A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, there was a man in Jerusalem, whose name was Simeon; and the same man was just and devout, waiting for the consolation of Israel: and the Holy Ghost was upon him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost, that he should not see death, before he had seen the Lord's Christ.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he came by the Spirit into the temple: and when the parents brought in the child Jesus, to do for him after the custom of the law,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then took he him up in his arms, and blessed God, and said,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Lord, now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace, according to thy word:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: A light to lighten the Gentiles, and the glory of thy people Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Simeon blessed them, and said unto Mary his mother, Behold, this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel; and for a sign which shall be spoken against;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (Yea, a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also,) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there was one Anna, a prophetess, the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Aser: she was of a great age, and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years, which departed not from the temple, but served God with fastings and prayers night and day.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord, and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord, they returned into Galilee, to their own city Nazareth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, filled with wisdom: and the grace of God was upon him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was twelve years old, they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had fulfilled the days, as they returned, the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they, supposing him to have been in the company, went a day's journey; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they found him not, they turned back again to Jerusalem, seeking him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the doctors, both hearing them, and asking them questions.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they saw him, they were amazed: and his mother said unto him, Son, why hast thou thus dealt with us? behold, thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, How is it that ye sought me? wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he went down with them, and came to Nazareth, and was subject unto them: but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favour with God and man.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea, and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis, and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests, the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he came into all the country about Jordan, preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet, saying, The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, make his paths straight.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Every valley shall be filled, and every mountain and hill shall be brought low; and the crooked shall be made straight, and the rough ways shall be made smooth;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him, O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance, and begin not to say within yourselves, We have Abraham to our father: for I say unto you, That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees: every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the people asked him, saying, What shall we do then?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answereth and saith unto them, He that hath two coats, let him impart to him that hath none; and he that hath meat, let him do likewise.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came also publicans to be baptized, and said unto him, Master, what shall we do?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Exact no more than that which is appointed you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him, saying, And what shall we do? And he said unto them, Do violence to no man, neither accuse any falsely; and be content with your wages.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as the people were in expectation, and all men mused in their hearts of John, whether he were the Christ, or not;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: John answered, saying unto them all, I indeed baptize you with water; but one mightier than I cometh, the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose: he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whose fan is in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and will gather the wheat into his garner; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Herod the tetrarch, being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip's wife, and for all the evils which Herod had done,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Added yet this above all, that he shut up John in prison.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when all the people were baptized, it came to pass, that Jesus also being baptized, and praying, the heaven was opened,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him, and a voice came from heaven, which said, Thou art my beloved Son; in thee I am well pleased.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age, being (as was supposed) the son of Joseph, which was the son of Heli,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was the son of Mattathias, which was the son of Amos, which was the son of Naum, which was the son of Esli, which was the son of Nagge,

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was the son of Joanna, which was the son of Rhesa, which was the son of Zorobabel, which was the son of Salathiel, which was the son of Neri,

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was the son of Jesse, which was the son of Obed, which was the son of Booz, which was the son of Salmon, which was the son of Naasson,

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was the son of Jacob, which was the son of Isaac, which was the son of Abraham, which was the son of Thara, which was the son of Nachor,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was the son of Saruch, which was the son of Ragau, which was the son of Phalec, which was the son of Heber, which was the son of Sala,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was the son of Cainan, which was the son of Arphaxad, which was the son of Sem, which was the son of Noe, which was the son of Lamech,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was the son of Mathusala, which was the son of Enoch, which was the son of Jared, which was the son of Maleleel, which was the son of Cainan,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was the son of Enos, which was the son of Seth, which was the son of Adam, which was the son of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Being forty days tempted of the devil. And in those days he did eat nothing: and when they were ended, he afterward hungered.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the devil said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, command this stone that it be made bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered him, saying, It is written, That man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the devil, taking him up into an high mountain, shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the devil said unto him, All this power will I give thee, and the glory of them: for that is delivered unto me; and to whomsoever I will I give it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If thou therefore wilt worship me, all shall be thine.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Get thee behind me, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he brought him to Jerusalem, and set him on a pinnacle of the temple, and said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, cast thyself down from hence:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For it is written, He shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in their hands they shall bear thee up, lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answering said unto him, It is said, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the devil had ended all the temptation, he departed from him for a season.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee: and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he taught in their synagogues, being glorified of all.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up: and, as his custom was, he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and stood up for to read.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias. And when he had opened the book, he found the place where it was written,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to preach deliverance to the captives, and recovering of sight to the blind, to set at liberty them that are bruised,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he closed the book, and he gave it again to the minister, and sat down. And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he began to say unto them, This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph's son?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Ye will surely say unto me this proverb, Physician, heal thyself: whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum, do also here in thy country.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, Verily I say unto you, No prophet is accepted in his own country.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I tell you of a truth, many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias, when the heaven was shut up three years and six months, when great famine was throughout all the land;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But unto none of them was Elias sent, save unto Sarepta, a city of Sidon, unto a woman that was a widow.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet; and none of them was cleansed, saving Naaman the Syrian.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all they in the synagogue, when they heard these things, were filled with wrath,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And rose up, and thrust him out of the city, and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built, that they might cast him down headlong.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he passing through the midst of them went his way,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And came down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee, and taught them on the sabbath days.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were astonished at his doctrine: for his word was with power.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in the synagogue there was a man, which had a spirit of an unclean devil, and cried out with a loud voice,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, Let us alone; what have we to do with thee, thou Jesus of Nazareth? art thou come to destroy us? I know thee who thou art; the Holy One of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus rebuked him, saying, Hold thy peace, and come out of him. And when the devil had thrown him in the midst, he came out of him, and hurt him not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were all amazed, and spake among themselves, saying, What a word is this! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits, and they come out.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he arose out of the synagogue, and entered into Simon's house. And Simon's wife's mother was taken with a great fever; and they besought him for her.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he stood over her, and rebuked the fever; and it left her: and immediately she arose and ministered unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when the sun was setting, all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him; and he laid his hands on every one of them, and healed them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And devils also came out of many, crying out, and saying, Thou art Christ the Son of God. And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak: for they knew that he was Christ.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when it was day, he departed and went into a desert place: and the people sought him, and came unto him, and stayed him, that he should not depart from them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also: for therefore am I sent.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that, as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God, he stood by the lake of Gennesaret,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saw two ships standing by the lake: but the fishermen were gone out of them, and were washing their nets.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he entered into one of the ships, which was Simon's, and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land. And he sat down, and taught the people out of the ship.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when he had left speaking, he said unto Simon, Launch out into the deep, and let down your nets for a draught.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Simon answering said unto him, Master, we have toiled all the night, and have taken nothing: nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had this done, they inclosed a great multitude of fishes: and their net brake.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they beckoned unto their partners, which were in the other ship, that they should come and help them. And they came, and filled both the ships, so that they began to sink.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Simon Peter saw it, he fell down at Jesus' knees, saying, Depart from me; for I am a sinful man, O Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he was astonished, and all that were with him, at the draught of the fishes which they had taken:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And so was also James, and John, the sons of Zebedee, which were partners with Simon. And Jesus said unto Simon, Fear not; from henceforth thou shalt catch men.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had brought their ships to land, they forsook all, and followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, when he was in a certain city, behold a man full of leprosy: who seeing Jesus fell on his face, and besought him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will: be thou clean. And immediately the leprosy departed from him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he charged him to tell no man: but go, and shew thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing, according as Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him: and great multitudes came together to hear, and to be healed by him of their infirmities.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness, and prayed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
