column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he spake to them a parable; Behold the fig tree, and all the trees;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they now shoot forth, ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So likewise ye, when ye see these things come to pass, know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass away, till all be fulfilled.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Watch ye therefore, and pray always, that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple; and at night he went out, and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple, for to hear him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh, which is called the Passover.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him; for they feared the people.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot, being of the number of the twelve.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he went his way, and communed with the chief priests and captains, how he might betray him unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were glad, and covenanted to give him money.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he promised, and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came the day of unleavened bread, when the passover must be killed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he sent Peter and John, saying, Go and prepare us the passover, that we may eat.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Behold, when ye are entered into the city, there shall a man meet you, bearing a pitcher of water; follow him into the house where he entereth in.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house, The Master saith unto thee, Where is the guestchamber, where I shall eat the passover with my disciples?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished: there make ready.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they went, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the hour was come, he sat down, and the twelve apostles with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I say unto you, I will not any more eat thereof, until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and said, Take this, and divide it among yourselves:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I say unto you, I will not drink of the fruit of the vine, until the kingdom of God shall come.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he took bread, and gave thanks, and brake it, and gave unto them, saying, This is my body which is given for you: this do in remembrance of me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Likewise also the cup after supper, saying, This cup is the new testament in my blood, which is shed for you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But, behold, the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And truly the Son of man goeth, as it was determined: but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed!

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they began to inquire among themselves, which of them it was that should do this thing.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there was also a strife among them, which of them should be accounted the greatest.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But ye shall not be so: but he that is greatest among you, let him be as the younger; and he that is chief, as he that doth serve.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For whether is greater, he that sitteth at meat, or he that serveth? is not he that sitteth at meat? but I am among you as he that serveth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I appoint unto you a kingdom, as my Father hath appointed unto me;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom, and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold, Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not: and when thou art converted, strengthen thy brethren.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto him, Lord, I am ready to go with thee, both into prison, and to death.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, I tell thee, Peter, the cock shall not crow this day, before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, When I sent you without purse, and scrip, and shoes, lacked ye any thing? And they said, Nothing.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said he unto them, But now, he that hath a purse, let him take it, and likewise his scrip: and he that hath no sword, let him sell his garment, and buy one.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I say unto you, that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me, And he was reckoned among the transgressors: for the things concerning me have an end.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said, Lord, behold, here are two swords. And he said unto them, It is enough.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he came out, and went, as he was wont, to the mount of Olives; and his disciples also followed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was at the place, he said unto them, Pray that ye enter not into temptation.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone's cast, and kneeled down, and prayed,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he rose up from prayer, and was come to his disciples, he found them sleeping for sorrow,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto them, Why sleep ye? rise and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And while he yet spake, behold a multitude, and he that was called Judas, one of the twelve, went before them, and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they which were about him saw what would follow, they said unto him, Lord, shall we smite with the sword?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest, and cut off his right ear.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus answered and said, Suffer ye thus far. And he touched his ear, and healed him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests, and captains of the temple, and the elders, which were come to him, Be ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and staves?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When I was daily with you in the temple, ye stretched forth no hands against me: but this is your hour, and the power of darkness.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then took they him, and led him, and brought him into the high priest's house. And Peter followed afar off.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall, and were set down together, Peter sat down among them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire, and earnestly looked upon him, and said, This man was also with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he denied him, saying, Woman, I know him not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after a little while another saw him, and said, Thou art also of them. And Peter said, Man, I am not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed, saying, Of a truth this fellow also was with him: for he is a Galilaean.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Peter said, Man, I know not what thou sayest. And immediately, while he yet spake, the cock crew.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Lord turned, and looked upon Peter. And Peter remembered the word of the Lord, how he had said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Peter went out, and wept bitterly.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the men that held Jesus mocked him, and smote him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had blindfolded him, they struck him on the face, and asked him, saying, Prophesy, who is it that smote thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as soon as it was day, the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together, and led him into their council, saying,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Art thou the Christ? tell us. And he said unto them, If I tell you, ye will not believe:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And if I also ask you, ye will not answer me, nor let me go.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said they all, Art thou then the Son of God? And he said unto them, Ye say that I am.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said, What need we any further witness? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the whole multitude of them arose, and led him unto Pilate.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they began to accuse him, saying, We found this fellow perverting the nation, and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar, saying that he himself is Christ a King.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Pilate asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered him and said, Thou sayest it.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people, I find no fault in this man.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were the more fierce, saying, He stirreth up the people, teaching throughout all Jewry, beginning from Galilee to this place.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Pilate heard of Galilee, he asked whether the man were a Galilaean.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod's jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceeding glad: for he was desirous to see him of a long season, because he had heard many things of him; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then he questioned with him in many words; but he answered him nothing.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought, and mocked him, and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe, and sent him again to Pilate.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together: for before they were at enmity between themselves.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Said unto them, Ye have brought this man unto me, as one that perverteth the people: and, behold, I, having examined him before you, have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: No, nor yet Herod: for I sent you to him; and, lo, nothing worthy of death is done unto him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I will therefore chastise him, and release him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast.)

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they cried out all at once, saying, Away with this man, and release unto us Barabbas:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (Who for a certain sedition made in the city, and for murder, was cast into prison.)

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Pilate therefore, willing to release Jesus, spake again to them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they cried, saying, Crucify him, crucify him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them the third time, Why, what evil hath he done? I have found no cause of death in him: I will therefore chastise him, and let him go.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were instant with loud voices, requiring that he might be crucified. And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison, whom they had desired; but he delivered Jesus to their will.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they led him away, they laid hold upon one Simon, a Cyrenian, coming out of the country, and on him they laid the cross, that he might bear it after Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there followed him a great company of people, and of women, which also bewailed and lamented him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus turning unto them said, Daughters of Jerusalem, weep not for me, but weep for yourselves, and for your children.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For, behold, the days are coming, in the which they shall say, Blessed are the barren, and the wombs that never bare, and the paps which never gave suck.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains, Fall on us; and to the hills, Cover us.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For if they do these things in a green tree, what shall be done in the dry?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there were also two other, malefactors, led with him to be put to death.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come to the place, which is called Calvary, there they crucified him, and the malefactors, one on the right hand, and the other on the left.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the people stood beholding. And the rulers also with them derided him, saying, He saved others; let him save himself, if he be Christ, the chosen of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the soldiers also mocked him, coming to him, and offering him vinegar,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saying, If thou be the king of the Jews, save thyself.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek, and Latin, and Hebrew, This Is the King of the Jews.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him, saying, If thou be Christ, save thyself and us.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the other answering rebuked him, saying, Dost not thou fear God, seeing thou art in the same condemnation?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And we indeed justly; for we receive the due reward of our deeds: but this man hath done nothing amiss.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto Jesus, Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it was about the sixth hour, and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the sun was darkened, and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice, he said, Father, into thy hands I commend my spirit: and having said thus, he gave up the ghost.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when the centurion saw what was done, he glorified God, saying, Certainly this was a righteous man.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all the people that came together to that sight, beholding the things which were done, smote their breasts, and returned.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all his acquaintance, and the women that followed him from Galilee, stood afar off, beholding these things.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, there was a man named Joseph, a counsellor; and he was a good man, and a just:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them;) he was of Arimathaea, a city of the Jews: who also himself waited for the kingdom of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This man went unto Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he took it down, and wrapped it in linen, and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone, wherein never man before was laid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And that day was the preparation, and the sabbath drew on.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the women also, which came with him from Galilee, followed after, and beheld the sepulchre, and how his body was laid.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they returned, and prepared spices and ointments; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now upon the first day of the week, very early in the morning, they came unto the sepulchre, bringing the spices which they had prepared, and certain others with them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they entered in, and found not the body of the Lord Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, as they were much perplexed thereabout, behold, two men stood by them in shining garments:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they were afraid, and bowed down their faces to the earth, they said unto them, Why seek ye the living among the dead?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He is not here, but is risen: remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men, and be crucified, and the third day rise again.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they remembered his words,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And returned from the sepulchre, and told all these things unto the eleven, and to all the rest.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: It was Mary Magdalene, and Joanna, and Mary the mother of James, and other women that were with them, which told these things unto the apostles.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And their words seemed to them as idle tales, and they believed them not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then arose Peter, and ran unto the sepulchre; and stooping down, he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves, and departed, wondering in himself at that which was come to pass.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus, which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they talked together of all these things which had happened.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that, while they communed together and reasoned, Jesus himself drew near, and went with them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another, as ye walk, and are sad?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the one of them, whose name was Cleopas, answering said unto him, Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem, and hast not known the things which are come to pass there in these days?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, What things? And they said unto him, Concerning Jesus of Nazareth, which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death, and have crucified him.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel: and beside all this, to day is the third day since these things were done.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Yea, and certain women also of our company made us astonished, which were early at the sepulchre;

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they found not his body, they came, saying, that they had also seen a vision of angels, which said that he was alive.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre, and found it even so as the women had said: but him they saw not.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then he said unto them, O fools, and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets, he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they drew nigh unto the village, whither they went: and he made as though he would have gone further.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they constrained him, saying, Abide with us: for it is toward evening, and the day is far spent. And he went in to tarry with them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, as he sat at meat with them, he took bread, and blessed it, and brake, and gave to them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And their eyes were opened, and they knew him; and he vanished out of their sight.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said one to another, Did not our heart burn within us, while he talked with us by the way, and while he opened to us the scriptures?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they rose up the same hour, and returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and them that were with them,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, The Lord is risen indeed, and hath appeared to Simon.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they told what things were done in the way, and how he was known of them in breaking of bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they thus spake, Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had thus spoken, he shewed them his hands and his feet.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And while they yet believed not for joy, and wondered, he said unto them, Have ye here any meat?

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish, and of an honeycomb.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he took it, and did eat before them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, These are the words which I spake unto you, while I was yet with you, that all things must be fulfilled, which were written in the law of Moses, and in the prophets, and in the psalms, concerning me.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures,

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye are witnesses of these things.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, I send the promise of my Father upon you: but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem, until ye be endued with power from on high.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he led them out as far as to Bethany, and he lifted up his hands, and blessed them.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, while he blessed them, he was parted from them, and carried up into heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they worshipped him, and returned to Jerusalem with great joy:

column8: The Gospel According to St Luke
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And were continually in the temple, praising and blessing God. Amen.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The same was in the beginning with God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All things were made by him; and without him was not any thing made that was made.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In him was life; and the life was the light of men.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the light shineth in darkness; and the darkness comprehended it not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There was a man sent from God, whose name was John.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The same came for a witness, to bear witness of the Light, that all men through him might believe.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He was not that Light, but was sent to bear witness of that Light.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That was the true Light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He was in the world, and the world was made by him, and the world knew him not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He came unto his own, and his own received him not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which were born, not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father,) full of grace and truth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: John bare witness of him, and cried, saying, This was he of whom I spake, He that cometh after me is preferred before me: for he was before me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the law was given by Moses, but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this is the record of John, when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him, Who art thou?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he confessed, and denied not; but confessed, I am not the Christ.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they asked him, What then? Art thou Elias? And he saith, I am not. Art thou that prophet? And he answered, No.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said they unto him, Who art thou? that we may give an answer to them that sent us. What sayest thou of thyself?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He said, I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness, Make straight the way of the Lord, as said the prophet Esaias.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they asked him, and said unto him, Why baptizest thou then, if thou be not that Christ, nor Elias, neither that prophet?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: John answered them, saying, I baptize with water: but there standeth one among you, whom ye know not;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He it is, who coming after me is preferred before me, whose shoe's latchet I am not worthy to unloose.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan, where John was baptizing.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him, and saith, Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is he of whom I said, After me cometh a man which is preferred before me: for he was before me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I knew him not: but that he should be made manifest to Israel, therefore am I come baptizing with water.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And John bare record, saying, I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove, and it abode upon him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I knew him not: but he that sent me to baptize with water, the same said unto me, Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending, and remaining on him, the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I saw, and bare record that this is the Son of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Again the next day after John stood, and two of his disciples;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And looking upon Jesus as he walked, he saith, Behold the Lamb of God!

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the two disciples heard him speak, and they followed Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus turned, and saw them following, and saith unto them, What seek ye? They said unto him, Rabbi, (which is to say, being interpreted, Master,) where dwellest thou?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saith unto them, Come and see. They came and saw where he dwelt, and abode with him that day: for it was about the tenth hour.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: One of the two which heard John speak, and followed him, was Andrew, Simon Peter's brother.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He first findeth his own brother Simon, and saith unto him, We have found the Messias, which is, being interpreted, the Christ.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he brought him to Jesus. And when Jesus beheld him, he said, Thou art Simon the son of Jona: thou shalt be called Cephas, which is by interpretation, A stone.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee, and findeth Philip, and saith unto him, Follow me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now Philip was of Bethsaida, the city of Andrew and Peter.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Philip findeth Nathanael, and saith unto him, We have found him, of whom Moses in the law, and the prophets, did write, Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Nathanael said unto him, Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth? Philip saith unto him, Come and see.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him, and saith of him, Behold an Israelite indeed, in whom is no guile!

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nathanael saith unto him, Whence knowest thou me? Jesus answered and said unto him, Before that Philip called thee, when thou wast under the fig tree, I saw thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nathanael answered and saith unto him, Rabbi, thou art the Son of God; thou art the King of Israel.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto him, Because I said unto thee, I saw thee under the fig tree, believest thou? thou shalt see greater things than these.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he saith unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Hereafter ye shall see heaven open, and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee; and the mother of Jesus was there:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And both Jesus was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they wanted wine, the mother of Jesus saith unto him, They have no wine.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: His mother saith unto the servants, Whatsoever he saith unto you, do it.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there were set there six waterpots of stone, after the manner of the purifying of the Jews, containing two or three firkins apiece.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto them, Fill the waterpots with water. And they filled them up to the brim.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he saith unto them, Draw out now, and bear unto the governor of the feast. And they bare it.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saith unto him, Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine; and when men have well drunk, then that which is worse: but thou hast kept the good wine until now.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee, and manifested forth his glory; and his disciples believed on him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After this he went down to Capernaum, he, and his mother, and his brethren, and his disciples: and they continued there not many days.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Jews' passover was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves, and the changers of money sitting:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had made a scourge of small cords, he drove them all out of the temple, and the sheep, and the oxen; and poured out the changers' money, and overthrew the tables;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto them that sold doves, Take these things hence; make not my Father's house an house of merchandise.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his disciples remembered that it was written, The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then answered the Jews and said unto him, What sign shewest thou unto us, seeing that thou doest these things?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto them, Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the Jews, Forty and six years was this temple in building, and wilt thou rear it up in three days?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he spake of the temple of his body.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover, in the feast day, many believed in his name, when they saw the miracles which he did.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all men,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There was a man of the Pharisees, named Nicodemus, a ruler of the Jews:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The same came to Jesus by night, and said unto him, Rabbi, we know that thou art a teacher come from God: for no man can do these miracles that thou doest, except God be with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nicodemus saith unto him, How can a man be born when he is old? can he enter the second time into his mother's womb, and be born?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Marvel not that I said unto thee, Ye must be born again.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The wind bloweth where it listeth, and thou hearest the sound thereof, but canst not tell whence it cometh, and whither it goeth: so is every one that is born of the Spirit.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nicodemus answered and said unto him, How can these things be?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto him, Art thou a master of Israel, and knowest not these things?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto thee, We speak that we do know, and testify that we have seen; and ye receive not our witness.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If I have told you earthly things, and ye believe not, how shall ye believe, if I tell you of heavenly things?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And no man hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, even so must the Son of man be lifted up:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have eternal life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that believeth on him is not condemned: but he that believeth not is condemned already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this is the condemnation, that light is come into the world, and men loved darkness rather than light, because their deeds were evil.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light, neither cometh to the light, lest his deeds should be reproved.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light, that his deeds may be made manifest, that they are wrought in God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea; and there he tarried with them, and baptized.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim, because there was much water there: and they came, and were baptized.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For John was not yet cast into prison.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then there arose a question between some of John's disciples and the Jews about purifying.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they came unto John, and said unto him, Rabbi, he that was with thee beyond Jordan, to whom thou barest witness, behold, the same baptizeth, and all men come to him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: John answered and said, A man can receive nothing, except it be given him from heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye yourselves bear me witness, that I said, I am not the Christ, but that I am sent before him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom: but the friend of the bridegroom, which standeth and heareth him, rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom's voice: this my joy therefore is fulfilled.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He must increase, but I must decrease.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that cometh from above is above all: he that is of the earth is earthly, and speaketh of the earth: he that cometh from heaven is above all.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And what he hath seen and heard, that he testifieth; and no man receiveth his testimony.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God: for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (Though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples,)

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He left Judaea, and departed again into Galilee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he must needs go through Samaria.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria, which is called Sychar, near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now Jacob's well was there. Jesus therefore, being wearied with his journey, sat thus on the well: and it was about the sixth hour.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water: Jesus saith unto her, Give me to drink.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat.)

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him, How is it that thou, being a Jew, askest drink of me, which am a woman of Samaria? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The woman saith unto him, Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: from whence then hast thou that living water?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, which gave us the well, and drank thereof himself, and his children, and his cattle?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto her, Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The woman saith unto him, Sir, give me this water, that I thirst not, neither come hither to draw.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto her, Go, call thy husband, and come hither.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The woman answered and said, I have no husband. Jesus said unto her, Thou hast well said, I have no husband:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The woman saith unto him, Sir, I perceive that thou art a prophet.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain; and ye say, that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, believe me, the hour cometh, when ye shall neither in this mountain, nor yet at Jerusalem, worship the Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye worship ye know not what: we know what we worship: for salvation is of the Jews.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The woman saith unto him, I know that Messias cometh, which is called Christ: when he is come, he will tell us all things.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto her, I that speak unto thee am he.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And upon this came his disciples, and marvelled that he talked with the woman: yet no man said, What seekest thou? or, Why talkest thou with her?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The woman then left her waterpot, and went her way into the city, and saith to the men,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Come, see a man, which told me all things that ever I did: is not this the Christ?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then they went out of the city, and came unto him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In the mean while his disciples prayed him, saying, Master, eat.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he said unto them, I have meat to eat that ye know not of.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore said the disciples one to another, Hath any man brought him ought to eat?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Say not ye, There are yet four months, and then cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he that reapeth receiveth wages, and gathereth fruit unto life eternal: that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And herein is that saying true, One soweth, and another reapeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour: other men laboured, and ye are entered into their labours.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman, which testified, He told me all that ever I did.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So when the Samaritans were come unto him, they besought him that he would tarry with them: and he abode there two days.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many more believed because of his own word;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying: for we have heard him ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now after two days he departed thence, and went into Galilee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For Jesus himself testified, that a prophet hath no honour in his own country.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then when he was come into Galilee, the Galilaeans received him, having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast: for they also went unto the feast.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee, he went unto him, and besought him that he would come down, and heal his son: for he was at the point of death.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus unto him, Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The nobleman saith unto him, Sir, come down ere my child die.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto him, Go thy way; thy son liveth. And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him, and he went his way.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as he was now going down, his servants met him, and told him, saying, Thy son liveth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend. And they said unto him, Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So the father knew that it was at the same hour, in the which Jesus said unto him, Thy son liveth: and himself believed, and his whole house.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did, when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After this there was a feast of the Jews; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool, which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda, having five porches.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk, of blind, halt, withered, waiting for the moving of the water.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool, and troubled the water: whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a certain man was there, which had an infirmity thirty and eight years.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus saw him lie, and knew that he had been now a long time in that case, he saith unto him, Wilt thou be made whole?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The impotent man answered him, Sir, I have no man, when the water is troubled, to put me into the pool: but while I am coming, another steppeth down before me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto him, Rise, take up thy bed, and walk.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And immediately the man was made whole, and took up his bed, and walked: and on the same day was the sabbath.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured, It is the sabbath day: it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered them, He that made me whole, the same said unto me, Take up thy bed, and walk.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then asked they him, What man is that which said unto thee, Take up thy bed, and walk?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he that was healed wist not who it was: for Jesus had conveyed himself away, a multitude being in that place.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple, and said unto him, Behold, thou art made whole: sin no more, lest a worse thing come unto thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The man departed, and told the Jews that it was Jesus, which had made him whole.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus, and sought to slay him, because he had done these things on the sabbath day.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Jesus answered them, My Father worketh hitherto, and I work.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him, because he not only had broken the sabbath, but said also that God was his Father, making himself equal with God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then answered Jesus and said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, The Son can do nothing of himself, but what he seeth the Father do: for what things soever he doeth, these also doeth the Son likewise.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the Father loveth the Son, and sheweth him all things that himself doeth: and he will shew him greater works than these, that ye may marvel.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as the Father raiseth up the dead, and quickeneth them; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the Father judgeth no man, but hath committed all judgment unto the Son:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That all men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father. He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that heareth my word, and believeth on him that sent me, hath everlasting life, and shall not come into condemnation; but is passed from death unto life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The hour is coming, and now is, when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God: and they that hear shall live.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also, because he is the Son of man.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Marvel not at this: for the hour is coming, in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And shall come forth; they that have done good, unto the resurrection of life; and they that have done evil, unto the resurrection of damnation.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I can of mine own self do nothing: as I hear, I judge: and my judgment is just; because I seek not mine own will, but the will of the Father which hath sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If I bear witness of myself, my witness is not true.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There is another that beareth witness of me; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye sent unto John, and he bare witness unto the truth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I receive not testimony from man: but these things I say, that ye might be saved.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He was a burning and a shining light: and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I have greater witness than that of John: for the works which the Father hath given me to finish, the same works that I do, bear witness of me, that the Father hath sent me.
