column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Father himself, which hath sent me, hath borne witness of me. Ye have neither heard his voice at any time, nor seen his shape.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye have not his word abiding in you: for whom he hath sent, him ye believe not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Search the scriptures; for in them ye think ye have eternal life: and they are they which testify of me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye will not come to me, that ye might have life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I receive not honour from men.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I know you, that ye have not the love of God in you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am come in my Father's name, and ye receive me not: if another shall come in his own name, him ye will receive.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: How can ye believe, which receive honour one of another, and seek not the honour that cometh from God only?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father: there is one that accuseth you, even Moses, in whom ye trust.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For had ye believed Moses, ye would have believed me: for he wrote of me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if ye believe not his writings, how shall ye believe my words?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee, which is the sea of Tiberias.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a great multitude followed him, because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus went up into a mountain, and there he sat with his disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the passover, a feast of the Jews, was nigh.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes, and saw a great company come unto him, he saith unto Philip, Whence shall we buy bread, that these may eat?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this he said to prove him: for he himself knew what he would do.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Philip answered him, Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them, that every one of them may take a little.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: One of his disciples, Andrew, Simon Peter's brother, saith unto him,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There is a lad here, which hath five barley loaves, and two small fishes: but what are they among so many?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said, Make the men sit down. Now there was much grass in the place. So the men sat down, in number about five thousand.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus took the loaves; and when he had given thanks, he distributed to the disciples, and the disciples to them that were set down; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they were filled, he said unto his disciples, Gather up the fragments that remain, that nothing be lost.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore they gathered them together, and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves, which remained over and above unto them that had eaten.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then those men, when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did, said, This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force, to make him a king, he departed again into a mountain himself alone.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when even was now come, his disciples went down unto the sea,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And entered into a ship, and went over the sea toward Capernaum. And it was now dark, and Jesus was not come to them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs, they see Jesus walking on the sea, and drawing nigh unto the ship: and they were afraid.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he saith unto them, It is I; be not afraid.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then they willingly received him into the ship: and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The day following, when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there, save that one whereinto his disciples were entered, and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat, but that his disciples were gone away alone;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread, after that the Lord had given thanks:)

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there, neither his disciples, they also took shipping, and came to Capernaum, seeking for Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea, they said unto him, Rabbi, when camest thou hither?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered them and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Ye seek me, not because ye saw the miracles, but because ye did eat of the loaves, and were filled.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Labour not for the meat which perisheth, but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life, which the Son of man shall give unto you: for him hath God the Father sealed.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said they unto him, What shall we do, that we might work the works of God?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto them, This is the work of God, that ye believe on him whom he hath sent.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They said therefore unto him, What sign shewest thou then, that we may see, and believe thee? what dost thou work?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert; as it is written, He gave them bread from heaven to eat.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Moses gave you not that bread from heaven; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said they unto him, Lord, evermore give us this bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I said unto you, That ye also have seen me, and believe not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this is the Father's will which hath sent me, that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing, but should raise it up again at the last day.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this is the will of him that sent me, that every one which seeth the Son, and believeth on him, may have everlasting life: and I will raise him up at the last day.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Jews then murmured at him, because he said, I am the bread which came down from heaven.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said, Is not this Jesus, the son of Joseph, whose father and mother we know? how is it then that he saith, I came down from heaven?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them, Murmur not among yourselves.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: No man can come to me, except the Father which hath sent me draw him: and I will raise him up at the last day.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: It is written in the prophets, And they shall be all taught of God. Every man therefore that hath heard, and hath learned of the Father, cometh unto me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Not that any man hath seen the Father, save he which is of God, he hath seen the Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that believeth on me hath everlasting life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am that bread of life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness, and are dead.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven, that a man may eat thereof, and not die.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live for ever: and the bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Jews therefore strove among themselves, saying, How can this man give us his flesh to eat?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man, and drink his blood, ye have no life in you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whoso eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, hath eternal life; and I will raise him up at the last day.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For my flesh is meat indeed, and my blood is drink indeed.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, dwelleth in me, and I in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As the living Father hath sent me, and I live by the Father: so he that eateth me, even he shall live by me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is that bread which came down from heaven: not as your fathers did eat manna, and are dead: he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These things said he in the synagogue, as he taught in Capernaum.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Many therefore of his disciples, when they had heard this, said, This is an hard saying; who can hear it?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it, he said unto them, Doth this offend you?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But there are some of you that believe not. For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not, and who should betray him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, Therefore said I unto you, that no man can come unto me, except it were given unto him of my Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: From that time many of his disciples went back, and walked no more with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus unto the twelve, Will ye also go away?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Simon Peter answered him, Lord, to whom shall we go? thou hast the words of eternal life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ, the Son of the living God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered them, Have not I chosen you twelve, and one of you is a devil?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon: for he it was that should betray him, being one of the twelve.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee: for he would not walk in Jewry, because the Jews sought to kill him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now the Jews' feast of tabernacles was at hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judaea, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret, and he himself seeketh to be known openly. If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For neither did his brethren believe in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus said unto them, My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast; for my time is not yet full come.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When he had said these words unto them, he abode still in Galilee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered them, and said, My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto them, I have done one work, and ye all marvel.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision, that the law of Moses should not be broken; are ye angry at me, because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying, Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus unto them, Yet a little while am I with you, and then I go unto him that sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the Jews among themselves, Whither will he go, that we shall not find him? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles, and teach the Gentiles?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: What manner of saying is this that he said, Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So there was a division among the people because of him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them,)

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Doth our law judge any man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And every man went unto his own house.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And early in the morning he came again into the temple, and all the people came unto him; and he sat down, and taught them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery; and when they had set her in the midst,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They say unto him, Master, this woman was taken in adultery, in the very act.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now Moses in the law commanded us, that such should be stoned: but what sayest thou?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This they said, tempting him, that they might have to accuse him. But Jesus stooped down, and with his finger wrote on the ground, as though he heard them not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So when they continued asking him, he lifted up himself, and said unto them, He that is without sin among you, let him first cast a stone at her.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And again he stooped down, and wrote on the ground.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they which heard it, being convicted by their own conscience, went out one by one, beginning at the eldest, even unto the last: and Jesus was left alone, and the woman standing in the midst.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus had lifted up himself, and saw none but the woman, he said unto her, Woman, where are those thine accusers? hath no man condemned thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: She said, No man, Lord. And Jesus said unto her, Neither do I condemn thee: go, and sin no more.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then spake Jesus again unto them, saying, I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Pharisees therefore said unto him, Thou bearest record of thyself; thy record is not true.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto them, Though I bear record of myself, yet my record is true: for I know whence I came, and whither I go; but ye cannot tell whence I come, and whither I go.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye judge after the flesh; I judge no man.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And yet if I judge, my judgment is true: for I am not alone, but I and the Father that sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: It is also written in your law, that the testimony of two men is true.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am one that bear witness of myself, and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said they unto him, Where is thy Father? Jesus answered, Ye neither know me, nor my Father: if ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These words spake Jesus in the treasury, as he taught in the temple: and no man laid hands on him; for his hour was not yet come.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus again unto them, I go my way, and ye shall seek me, and shall die in your sins: whither I go, ye cannot come.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the Jews, Will he kill himself? because he saith, Whither I go, ye cannot come.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Ye are from beneath; I am from above: ye are of this world; I am not of this world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I said therefore unto you, that ye shall die in your sins: for if ye believe not that I am he, ye shall die in your sins.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said they unto him, Who art thou? And Jesus saith unto them, Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I have many things to say and to judge of you: but he that sent me is true; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus unto them, When ye have lifted up the Son of man, then shall ye know that I am he, and that I do nothing of myself; but as my Father hath taught me, I speak these things.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he that sent me is with me: the Father hath not left me alone; for I do always those things that please him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As he spake these words, many believed on him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him, If ye continue in my word, then are ye my disciples indeed;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They answered him, We be Abraham's seed, and were never in bondage to any man: how sayest thou, Ye shall be made free?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever: but the Son abideth ever.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I know that ye are Abraham's seed; but ye seek to kill me, because my word hath no place in you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I speak that which I have seen with my Father: and ye do that which ye have seen with your father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They answered and said unto him, Abraham is our father. Jesus saith unto them, If ye were Abraham's children, ye would do the works of Abraham.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But now ye seek to kill me, a man that hath told you the truth, which I have heard of God: this did not Abraham.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye do the deeds of your father. Then said they to him, We be not born of fornication; we have one Father, even God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus said unto them, If God were your Father, ye would love me: for I proceeded forth and came from God; neither came I of myself, but he sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Why do ye not understand my speech? even because ye cannot hear my word.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye are of your father the devil, and the lusts of your father ye will do. He was a murderer from the beginning, and abode not in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaketh a lie, he speaketh of his own: for he is a liar, and the father of it.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And because I tell you the truth, ye believe me not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which of you convinceth me of sin? And if I say the truth, why do ye not believe me?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that is of God heareth God's words: ye therefore hear them not, because ye are not of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then answered the Jews, and said unto him, Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan, and hast a devil?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered, I have not a devil; but I honour my Father, and ye do dishonour me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I seek not mine own glory: there is one that seeketh and judgeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, If a man keep my saying, he shall never see death.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the Jews unto him, Now we know that thou hast a devil. Abraham is dead, and the prophets; and thou sayest, If a man keep my saying, he shall never taste of death.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Art thou greater than our father Abraham, which is dead? and the prophets are dead: whom makest thou thyself?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered, If I honour myself, my honour is nothing: it is my Father that honoureth me; of whom ye say, that he is your God:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Yet ye have not known him; but I know him: and if I should say, I know him not, I shall be a liar like unto you: but I know him, and keep his saying.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day: and he saw it, and was glad.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the Jews unto him, Thou art not yet fifty years old, and hast thou seen Abraham?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Before Abraham was, I am.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then took they up stones to cast at him: but Jesus hid himself, and went out of the temple, going through the midst of them, and so passed by.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as Jesus passed by, he saw a man which was blind from his birth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And his disciples asked him, saying, Master, who did sin, this man, or his parents, that he was born blind?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered, Neither hath this man sinned, nor his parents: but that the works of God should be made manifest in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As long as I am in the world, I am the light of the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When he had thus spoken, he spat on the ground, and made clay of the spittle, and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto him, Go, wash in the pool of Siloam, (which is by interpretation, Sent.) He went his way therefore, and washed, and came seeing.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The neighbours therefore, and they which before had seen him that he was blind, said, Is not this he that sat and begged?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Some said, This is he: others said, He is like him: but he said, I am he.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore said they unto him, How were thine eyes opened?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered and said, A man that is called Jesus made clay, and anointed mine eyes, and said unto me, Go to the pool of Siloam, and wash: and I went and washed, and I received sight.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said they unto him, Where is he? He said, I know not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay, and opened his eyes.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight. He said unto them, He put clay upon mine eyes, and I washed, and do see.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore said some of the Pharisees, This man is not of God, because he keepeth not the sabbath day. Others said, How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles? And there was a division among them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They say unto the blind man again, What sayest thou of him, that he hath opened thine eyes? He said, He is a prophet.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the Jews did not believe concerning him, that he had been blind, and received his sight, until they called the parents of him that had received his sight.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they asked them, saying, Is this your son, who ye say was born blind? how then doth he now see?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: His parents answered them and said, We know that this is our son, and that he was born blind:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But by what means he now seeth, we know not; or who hath opened his eyes, we know not: he is of age; ask him: he shall speak for himself.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These words spake his parents, because they feared the Jews: for the Jews had agreed already, that if any man did confess that he was Christ, he should be put out of the synagogue.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore said his parents, He is of age; ask him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then again called they the man that was blind, and said unto him, Give God the praise: we know that this man is a sinner.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered and said, Whether he be a sinner or no, I know not: one thing I know, that, whereas I was blind, now I see.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said they to him again, What did he to thee? how opened he thine eyes?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered them, I have told you already, and ye did not hear: wherefore would ye hear it again? will ye also be his disciples?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then they reviled him, and said, Thou art his disciple; but we are Moses' disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: We know that God spake unto Moses: as for this fellow, we know not from whence he is.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The man answered and said unto them, Why herein is a marvellous thing, that ye know not from whence he is, and yet he hath opened mine eyes.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now we know that God heareth not sinners: but if any man be a worshipper of God, and doeth his will, him he heareth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If this man were not of God, he could do nothing.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They answered and said unto him, Thou wast altogether born in sins, and dost thou teach us? And they cast him out.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus heard that they had cast him out; and when he had found him, he said unto him, Dost thou believe on the Son of God?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He answered and said, Who is he, Lord, that I might believe on him?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said unto him, Thou hast both seen him, and it is he that talketh with thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, Lord, I believe. And he worshipped him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus said, For judgment I am come into this world, that they which see not might see; and that they which see might be made blind.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words, and said unto him, Are we blind also?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus said unto them, If ye were blind, ye should have no sin: but now ye say, We see; therefore your sin remaineth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold, but climbeth up some other way, the same is a thief and a robber.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To him the porter openeth; and the sheep hear his voice: and he calleth his own sheep by name, and leadeth them out.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he putteth forth his own sheep, he goeth before them, and the sheep follow him: for they know his voice.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a stranger will they not follow, but will flee from him: for they know not the voice of strangers.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This parable spake Jesus unto them: but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus unto them again, Verily, verily, I say unto you, I am the door of the sheep.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers: but the sheep did not hear them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am the door: by me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that is an hireling, and not the shepherd, whose own the sheep are not, seeth the wolf coming, and leaveth the sheep, and fleeth: and the wolf catcheth them, and scattereth the sheep.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The hireling fleeth, because he is an hireling, and careth not for the sheep.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am the good shepherd, and know my sheep, and am known of mine.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As the Father knoweth me, even so know I the Father: and I lay down my life for the sheep.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And other sheep I have, which are not of this fold: them also I must bring, and they shall hear my voice; and there shall be one fold, and one shepherd.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many of them said, He hath a devil, and is mad; why hear ye him?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Others said, These are not the words of him that hath a devil. Can a devil open the eyes of the blind?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication, and it was winter.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon's porch.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came the Jews round about him, and said unto him, How long dost thou make us to doubt? If thou be the Christ, tell us plainly.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered them, I told you, and ye believed not: the works that I do in my Father's name, they bear witness of me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But ye believe not, because ye are not of my sheep, as I said unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I and my Father are one.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered them, Many good works have I shewed you from my Father; for which of those works do ye stone me?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Jews answered him, saying, For a good work we stone thee not; but for blasphemy; and because that thou, being a man, makest thyself God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered them, Is it not written in your law, I said, Ye are gods?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If he called them gods, unto whom the word of God came, and the scripture cannot be broken;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Say ye of him, whom the Father hath sanctified, and sent into the world, Thou blasphemest; because I said, I am the Son of God?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If I do not the works of my Father, believe me not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if I do, though ye believe not me, believe the works: that ye may know, and believe, that the Father is in me, and I in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore they sought again to take him: but he escaped out of their hand,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized; and there he abode.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many resorted unto him, and said, John did no miracle: but all things that John spake of this man were true.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many believed on him there.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now a certain man was sick, named Lazarus, of Bethany, the town of Mary and her sister Martha.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment, and wiped his feet with her hair, whose brother Lazarus was sick.)

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if a man walk in the night, he stumbleth, because there is no light in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said his disciples, Lord, if he sleep, he shall do well.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem, about fifteen furlongs off:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary, to comfort them concerning their brother.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was, and saw him, she fell down at his feet, saying unto him, Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother had not died.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto her, Said I not unto thee, that, if thou wouldest believe, thou shouldest see the glory of God?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he thus had spoken, he cried with a loud voice, Lazarus, come forth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he that was dead came forth, bound hand and foot with graveclothes: and his face was bound about with a napkin. Jesus saith unto them, Loose him, and let him go.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary, and had seen the things which Jesus did, believed on him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And one of them, named Caiaphas, being the high priest that same year, said unto them, Ye know nothing at all,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness, into a city called Ephraim, and there continued with his disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Jews' passover was nigh at hand: and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover, to purify themselves.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany, where Lazarus was which had been dead, whom he raised from the dead.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard, very costly, and anointed the feet of Jesus, and wiped his feet with her hair: and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment.

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith one of his disciples, Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, which should betray him,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there: and they came not for Jesus' sake only, but that they might see Lazarus also, whom he had raised from the dead.

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column17: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death;

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column17: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away, and believed on Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that loveth his life shall lose it; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The people answered him, We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever: and how sayest thou, The Son of man must be lifted up? who is this Son of man?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus said unto them, Yet a little while is the light with you. Walk while ye have the light, lest darkness come upon you: for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that rejecteth me, and receiveth not my words, hath one that judgeth him: the word that I have spoken, the same shall judge him in the last day.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I have not spoken of myself; but the Father which sent me, he gave me a commandment, what I should say, and what I should speak.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting: whatsoever I speak therefore, even as the Father said unto me, so I speak.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now before the feast of the passover, when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father, having loved his own which were in the world, he loved them unto the end.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And supper being ended, the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, to betray him;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands, and that he was come from God, and went to God;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then cometh he to Simon Peter: and Peter saith unto him, Lord, dost thou wash my feet?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto him, What I do thou knowest not now; but thou shalt know hereafter.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he knew who should betray him; therefore said he, Ye are not all clean.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So after he had washed their feet, and had taken his garments, and was set down again, he said unto them, Know ye what I have done to you?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye call me Master and Lord: and ye say well; for so I am.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If I then, your Lord and Master, have washed your feet; ye also ought to wash one another's feet.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I have given you an example, that ye should do as I have done to you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I speak not of you all: I know whom I have chosen: but that the scripture may be fulfilled, He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now I tell you before it come, that, when it is come to pass, ye may believe that I am he.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus had thus said, he was troubled in spirit, and testified, and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the disciples looked one on another, doubting of whom he spake.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column8: The Gospel According to St John

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples, if ye have love one to another.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Simon Peter said unto him, Lord, whither goest thou? Jesus answered him, Whither I go, thou canst not follow me now; but thou shalt follow me afterwards.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Peter said unto him, Lord, why cannot I follow thee now? I will lay down my life for thy sake.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered him, Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake? Verily, verily, I say unto thee, The cock shall not crow, till thou hast denied me thrice.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Let not your heart be troubled: ye believe in God, believe also in me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
