column17: And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whither I go ye know, and the way ye know.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thomas saith unto him, Lord, we know not whither thou goest; and how can we know the way?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also: and from henceforth ye know him, and have seen him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Philip saith unto him, Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto him, Have I been so long time with you, and yet hast thou not known me, Philip? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father; and how sayest thou then, Shew us the Father?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Believest thou not that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself: but the Father that dwelleth in me, he doeth the works.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Believe me that I am in the Father, and the Father in me: or else believe me for the very works' sake.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that believeth on me, the works that I do shall he do also; and greater works than these shall he do; because I go unto my Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If ye shall ask any thing in my name, I will do it.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If ye love me, keep my commandments.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Yet a little while, and the world seeth me no more; but ye see me: because I live, ye shall live also.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father, and ye in me, and I in you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Judas saith unto him, not Iscariot, Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings: and the word which ye hear is not mine, but the Father's which sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These things have I spoken unto you, being yet present with you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye have heard how I said unto you, I go away, and come again unto you. If ye loved me, ye would rejoice, because I said, I go unto the Father: for my Father is greater than I.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now I have told you before it come to pass, that, when it is come to pass, ye might believe.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Hereafter I will not talk much with you: for the prince of this world cometh, and hath nothing in me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But that the world may know that I love the Father; and as the Father gave me commandment, even so I do. Arise, let us go hence.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These things I command you, that ye love one another.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But all these things will they do unto you for my name's sake, because they know not him that sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloak for their sin.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye also shall bear witness, because ye have been with me from the beginning.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be offended.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They shall put you out of the synagogues: yea, the time cometh, that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And these things will they do unto you, because they have not known the Father, nor me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But these things have I told you, that when the time shall come, ye may remember that I told you of them. And these things I said not unto you at the beginning, because I was with you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But now I go my way to him that sent me; and none of you asketh me, Whither goest thou?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But because I have said these things unto you, sorrow hath filled your heart.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he is come, he will reprove the world of sin, and of righteousness, and of judgment:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Of sin, because they believe not on me;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Of righteousness, because I go to my Father, and ye see me no more;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Of judgment, because the prince of this world is judged.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: All things that the Father hath are mine: therefore said I, that he shall take of mine, and shall shew it unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me, because I go to the Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said some of his disciples among themselves, What is this that he saith unto us, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me: and, Because I go to the Father?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They said therefore, What is this that he saith, A little while? we cannot tell what he saith.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him, and said unto them, Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto you, That ye shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: and ye shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall be turned into joy.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but as soon as she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for joy that a man is born into the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And ye now therefore have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no man taketh from you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs: but the time cometh, when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs, but I shall shew you plainly of the Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: At that day ye shall ask in my name: and I say not unto you, that I will pray the Father for you:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came out from God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I came forth from the Father, and am come into the world: again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: His disciples said unto him, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no proverb.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold, the hour cometh, yea, is now come, that ye shall be scattered, every man to his own, and shall leave me alone: and yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As thou hast given him power over all flesh, that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I have glorified thee on the earth: I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now, O Father, glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world: thine they were, and thou gavest them me; and they have kept thy word.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me; and they have received them, and have known surely that I came out from thee, and they have believed that thou didst send me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I pray for them: I pray not for the world, but for them which thou hast given me; for they are thine.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I come to thee. Holy Father, keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me, that they may be one, as we are.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost, but the son of perdition; that the scripture might be fulfilled.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now come I to thee; and these things I speak in the world, that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As thou hast sent me into the world, even so have I also sent them into the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Neither pray I for these alone, but for them also which shall believe on me through their word;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: O righteous Father, the world hath not known thee: but I have known thee, and these have known that thou hast sent me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I have declared unto them thy name, and will declare it: that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them, and I in them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus had spoken these words, he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron, where was a garden, into the which he entered, and his disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Judas also, which betrayed him, knew the place: for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Judas then, having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees, cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus therefore, knowing all things that should come upon him, went forth, and said unto them, Whom seek ye?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They answered him, Jesus of Nazareth. Jesus saith unto them, I am he. And Judas also, which betrayed him, stood with them.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As soon then as he had said unto them, I am he, they went backward, and fell to the ground.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then asked he them again, Whom seek ye? And they said, Jesus of Nazareth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered, I have told you that I am he: if therefore ye seek me, let these go their way:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That the saying might be fulfilled, which he spake, Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it, and smote the high priest's servant, and cut off his right ear. The servant's name was Malchus.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus unto Peter, Put up thy sword into the sheath: the cup which my Father hath given me, shall I not drink it?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus, and bound him,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And led him away to Annas first; for he was father in law to Caiaphas, which was the high priest that same year.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now Caiaphas was he, which gave counsel to the Jews, that it was expedient that one man should die for the people.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Simon Peter followed Jesus, and so did another disciple: that disciple was known unto the high priest, and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Peter stood at the door without. Then went out that other disciple, which was known unto the high priest, and spake unto her that kept the door, and brought in Peter.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter, Art not thou also one of this man's disciples? He saith, I am not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the servants and officers stood there, who had made a fire of coals; for it was cold: and they warmed themselves: and Peter stood with them, and warmed himself.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples, and of his doctrine.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered him, I spake openly to the world; I ever taught in the synagogue, and in the temple, whither the Jews always resort; and in secret have I said nothing.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Why askest thou me? ask them which heard me, what I have said unto them: behold, they know what I said.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had thus spoken, one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand, saying, Answerest thou the high priest so?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered him, If I have spoken evil, bear witness of the evil: but if well, why smitest thou me?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself. They said therefore unto him, Art not thou also one of his disciples? He denied it, and said, I am not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: One of the servants of the high priest, being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off, saith, Did not I see thee in the garden with him?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Peter then denied again: and immediately the cock crew.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment: and it was early; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall, lest they should be defiled; but that they might eat the passover.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Pilate then went out unto them, and said, What accusation bring ye against this man?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They answered and said unto him, If he were not a malefactor, we would not have delivered him up unto thee.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Pilate unto them, Take ye him, and judge him according to your law. The Jews therefore said unto him, It is not lawful for us to put any man to death:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled, which he spake, signifying what death he should die.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again, and called Jesus, and said unto him, Art thou the King of the Jews?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered him, Sayest thou this thing of thyself, or did others tell it thee of me?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Pilate answered, Am I a Jew? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me: what hast thou done?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered, My kingdom is not of this world: if my kingdom were of this world, then would my servants fight, that I should not be delivered to the Jews: but now is my kingdom not from hence.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Pilate therefore said unto him, Art thou a king then? Jesus answered, Thou sayest that I am a king. To this end was I born, and for this cause came I into the world, that I should bear witness unto the truth. Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Pilate saith unto him, What is truth? And when he had said this, he went out again unto the Jews, and saith unto them, I find in him no fault at all.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But ye have a custom, that I should release unto you one at the passover: will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then cried they all again, saying, Not this man, but Barabbas. Now Barabbas was a robber.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus, and scourged him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the soldiers plaited a crown of thorns, and put it on his head, and they put on him a purple robe,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said, Hail, King of the Jews! and they smote him with their hands.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Pilate therefore went forth again, and saith unto them, Behold, I bring him forth to you, that ye may know that I find no fault in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came Jesus forth, wearing the crown of thorns, and the purple robe. And Pilate saith unto them, Behold the man!

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him, they cried out, saying, Crucify him, crucify him. Pilate saith unto them, Take ye him, and crucify him: for I find no fault in him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Jews answered him, We have a law, and by our law he ought to die, because he made himself the Son of God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he was the more afraid;

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And went again into the judgment hall, and saith unto Jesus, Whence art thou? But Jesus gave him no answer.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith Pilate unto him, Speakest thou not unto me? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee, and have power to release thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus answered, Thou couldest have no power at all against me, except it were given thee from above: therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him: but the Jews cried out, saying, If thou let this man go, thou art not Caesar's friend: whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he brought Jesus forth, and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement, but in the Hebrew, Gabbatha.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it was the preparation of the passover, and about the sixth hour: and he saith unto the Jews, Behold your King!

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they cried out, Away with him, away with him, crucify him. Pilate saith unto them, Shall I crucify your King? The chief priests answered, We have no king but Caesar.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified. And they took Jesus, and led him away.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull, which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Where they crucified him, and two other with him, on either side one, and Jesus in the midst.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Pilate wrote a title, and put it on the cross. And the writing was, Jesus of Nazareth the King of the Jews.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This title then read many of the Jews: for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city: and it was written in Hebrew, and Greek, and Latin.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate, Write not, The King of the Jews; but that he said, I am King of the Jews.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Pilate answered, What I have written I have written.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the soldiers, when they had crucified Jesus, took his garments, and made four parts, to every soldier a part; and also his coat: now the coat was without seam, woven from the top throughout.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They said therefore among themselves, Let us not rend it, but cast lots for it, whose it shall be: that the scripture might be fulfilled, which saith, They parted my raiment among them, and for my vesture they did cast lots. These things therefore the soldiers did.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother, and his mother's sister, Mary the wife of Cleophas, and Mary Magdalene.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus therefore saw his mother, and the disciple standing by, whom he loved, he saith unto his mother, Woman, behold thy son!

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith he to the disciple, Behold thy mother! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After this, Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished, that the scripture might be fulfilled, saith, I thirst.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar: and they filled a sponge with vinegar, and put it upon hyssop, and put it to his mouth.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar, he said, It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The Jews therefore, because it was the preparation, that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day, (for that sabbath day was an high day,) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken, and that they might be taken away.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came the soldiers, and brake the legs of the first, and of the other which was crucified with him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when they came to Jesus, and saw that he was dead already, they brake not his legs:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side, and forthwith came there out blood and water.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he that saw it bare record, and his record is true: and he knoweth that he saith true, that ye might believe.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For these things were done, that the scripture should be fulfilled, A bone of him shall not be broken.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And again another scripture saith, They shall look on him whom they pierced.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea, being a disciple of Jesus, but secretly for fear of the Jews, besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus: and Pilate gave him leave. He came therefore, and took the body of Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there came also Nicodemus, which at the first came to Jesus by night, and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes, about an hundred pound weight.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then took they the body of Jesus, and wound it in linen clothes with the spices, as the manner of the Jews is to bury.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden; and in the garden a new sepulchre, wherein was never man yet laid.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews' preparation day; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early, when it was yet dark, unto the sepulchre, and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then she runneth, and cometh to Simon Peter, and to the other disciple, whom Jesus loved, and saith unto them, They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre, and we know not where they have laid him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Peter therefore went forth, and that other disciple, and came to the sepulchre.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So they ran both together: and the other disciple did outrun Peter, and came first to the sepulchre.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he stooping down, and looking in, saw the linen clothes lying; yet went he not in.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then cometh Simon Peter following him, and went into the sepulchre, and seeth the linen clothes lie,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the napkin, that was about his head, not lying with the linen clothes, but wrapped together in a place by itself.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then went in also that other disciple, which came first to the sepulchre, and he saw, and believed.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as yet they knew not the scripture, that he must rise again from the dead.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping: and as she wept, she stooped down, and looked into the sepulchre,

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And seeth two angels in white sitting, the one at the head, and the other at the feet, where the body of Jesus had lain.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they say unto her, Woman, why weepest thou? She saith unto them, Because they have taken away my Lord, and I know not where they have laid him.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when she had thus said, she turned herself back, and saw Jesus standing, and knew not that it was Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, why weepest thou? whom seekest thou? She, supposing him to be the gardener, saith unto him, Sir, if thou have borne him hence, tell me where thou hast laid him, and I will take him away.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto her, Mary. She turned herself, and saith unto him, Rabboni; which is to say, Master.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord, and that he had spoken these things unto her.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the same day at evening, being the first day of the week, when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews, came Jesus and stood in the midst, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had so said, he shewed unto them his hands and his side. Then were the disciples glad, when they saw the Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said Jesus to them again, Peace be unto you: as my Father hath sent me, even so send I you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had said this, he breathed on them, and saith unto them, Receive ye the Holy Ghost:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whose soever sins ye remit, they are remitted unto them; and whose soever sins ye retain, they are retained.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Thomas, one of the twelve, called Didymus, was not with them when Jesus came.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The other disciples therefore said unto him, We have seen the Lord. But he said unto them, Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails, and put my finger into the print of the nails, and thrust my hand into his side, I will not believe.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after eight days again his disciples were within, and Thomas with them: then came Jesus, the doors being shut, and stood in the midst, and said, Peace be unto you.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then saith he to Thomas, Reach hither thy finger, and behold my hands; and reach hither thy hand, and thrust it into my side: and be not faithless, but believing.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Thomas answered and said unto him, My Lord and my God.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples, which are not written in this book:

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But these are written, that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God; and that believing ye might have life through his name.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias; and on this wise shewed he himself.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There were together Simon Peter, and Thomas called Didymus, and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee, and the sons of Zebedee, and two other of his disciples.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Simon Peter saith unto them, I go a fishing. They say unto him, We also go with thee. They went forth, and entered into a ship immediately; and that night they caught nothing.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the morning was now come, Jesus stood on the shore: but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Jesus saith unto them, Children, have ye any meat? They answered him, No.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Cast the net on the right side of the ship, and ye shall find. They cast therefore, and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter, It is the Lord. Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord, he girt his fisher's coat unto him, (for he was naked,) and did cast himself into the sea.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the other disciples came in a little ship; (for they were not far from land, but as it were two hundred cubits,) dragging the net with fishes.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As soon then as they were come to land, they saw a fire of coals there, and fish laid thereon, and bread.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto them, Bring of the fish which ye have now caught.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Simon Peter went up, and drew the net to land full of great fishes, an hundred and fifty and three: and for all there were so many, yet was not the net broken.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto them, Come and dine. And none of the disciples durst ask him, Who art thou? knowing that it was the Lord.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus then cometh, and taketh bread, and giveth them, and fish likewise.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples, after that he was risen from the dead.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So when they had dined, Jesus saith to Simon Peter, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me more than these? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my lambs.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saith to him again the second time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my sheep.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saith unto him the third time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time, Lovest thou me? And he said unto him, Lord, thou knowest all things; thou knowest that I love thee. Jesus saith unto him, Feed my sheep.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Verily, verily, I say unto thee, When thou wast young, thou girdedst thyself, and walkedst whither thou wouldest: but when thou shalt be old, thou shalt stretch forth thy hands, and another shall gird thee, and carry thee whither thou wouldest not.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This spake he, signifying by what death he should glorify God. And when he had spoken this, he saith unto him, Follow me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Peter, turning about, seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following; which also leaned on his breast at supper, and said, Lord, which is he that betrayeth thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus, Lord, and what shall this man do?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Jesus saith unto him, If I will that he tarry till I come, what is that to thee? follow thou me.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren, that that disciple should not die: yet Jesus said not unto him, He shall not die; but, If I will that he tarry till I come, what is that to thee?

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things, and wrote these things: and we know that his testimony is true.

column8: The Gospel According to St John
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there are also many other things which Jesus did, the which, if they should be written every one, I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written. Amen.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The former treatise have I made, O Theophilus, of all that Jesus began both to do and teach,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Until the day in which he was taken up, after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs, being seen of them forty days, and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, being assembled together with them, commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem, but wait for the promise of the Father, which, saith he, ye have heard of me.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For John truly baptized with water; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they therefore were come together, they asked of him, saying, Lord, wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, It is not for you to know the times or the seasons, which the Father hath put in his own power.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But ye shall receive power, after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem, and in all Judaea, and in Samaria, and unto the uttermost part of the earth.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had spoken these things, while they beheld, he was taken up; and a cloud received him out of their sight.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And while they looked steadfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which also said, Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet, which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day's journey.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come in, they went up into an upper room, where abode both Peter, and James, and John, and Andrew, Philip, and Thomas, Bartholomew, and Matthew, James the son of Alphaeus, and Simon Zelotes, and Judas the brother of James.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication, with the women, and Mary the mother of Jesus, and with his brethren.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples, and said, (the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty,)

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Men and brethren, this scripture must needs have been fulfilled, which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas, which was guide to them that took Jesus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he was numbered with us, and had obtained part of this ministry.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity; and falling headlong, he burst asunder in the midst, and all his bowels gushed out.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue, Aceldama, that is to say, The field of blood.

column17: Then went the captain with the officers, and brought them without violence: for they feared the people, lest they should have been stoned.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had brought them, they set them before the council: and the high priest asked them,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name? and, behold, ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine, and intend to bring this man's blood upon us.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus, whom ye slew and hanged on a tree.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And we are his witnesses of these things; and so is also the Holy Ghost, whom God hath given to them that obey him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they heard that, they were cut to the heart, and took counsel to slay them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then stood there up one in the council, a Pharisee, named Gamaliel, a doctor of the law, had in reputation among all the people, and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto them, Ye men of Israel, take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing, and drew away much people after him: he also perished; and all, even as many as obeyed him, were dispersed.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now I say unto you, Refrain from these men, and let them alone: for if this counsel or this work be of men, it will come to nought:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But if it be of God, ye cannot overthrow it; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And to him they agreed: and when they had called the apostles, and beaten them, they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And daily in the temple, and in every house, they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in those days, when the number of the disciples was multiplied, there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews, because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer, and to the ministry of the word.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the saying pleased the whole multitude: and they chose Stephen, a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost, and Philip, and Prochorus, and Nicanor, and Timon, and Parmenas, and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whom they set before the apostles: and when they had prayed, they laid their hands on them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Stephen, full of faith and power, did great wonders and miracles among the people.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then they suborned men, which said, We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses, and against God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For we have heard him say, that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place, and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all that sat in the council, looking steadfastly on him, saw his face as it had been the face of an angel.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the high priest, Are these things so?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, Men, brethren, and fathers, hearken; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham, when he was in Mesopotamia, before he dwelt in Charran,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said unto him, Get thee out of thy country, and from thy kindred, and come into the land which I shall shew thee.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans, and dwelt in Charran: and from thence, when his father was dead, he removed him into this land, wherein ye now dwell.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he gave him none inheritance in it, no, not so much as to set his foot on: yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession, and to his seed after him, when as yet he had no child.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And God spake on this wise, That his seed should sojourn in a strange land; and that they should bring them into bondage, and entreat them evil four hundred years.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge, said God: and after that shall they come forth, and serve me in this place.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision: and so Abraham begat Isaac, and circumcised him the eighth day; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the patriarchs, moved with envy, sold Joseph into Egypt: but God was with him,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And delivered him out of all his afflictions, and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan, and great affliction: and our fathers found no sustenance.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt, he sent out our fathers first.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren; and Joseph's kindred was made known unto Pharaoh.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then sent Joseph, and called his father Jacob to him, and all his kindred, threescore and fifteen souls.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So Jacob went down into Egypt, and died, he, and our fathers,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And were carried over into Sychem, and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the time of the promise drew nigh, which God had sworn to Abraham, the people grew and multiplied in Egypt,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Till another king arose, which knew not Joseph.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred, and evil entreated our fathers, so that they cast out their young children, to the end they might not live.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In which time Moses was born, and was exceeding fair, and nourished up in his father's house three months:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was cast out, Pharaoh's daughter took him up, and nourished him for her own son.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians, and was mighty in words and in deeds.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he was full forty years old, it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And seeing one of them suffer wrong, he defended him, and avenged him that was oppressed, and smote the Egyptian:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them: but they understood not.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove, and would have set them at one again, saying, Sirs, ye are brethren; why do ye wrong one to another?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wilt thou kill me, as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then fled Moses at this saying, and was a stranger in the land of Madian, where he begat two sons.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when forty years were expired, there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When Moses saw it, he wondered at the sight: and as he drew near to behold it, the voice of the Lord came unto him,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, I am the God of thy fathers, the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob. Then Moses trembled, and durst not behold.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then said the Lord to him, Put off thy shoes from thy feet: for the place where thou standest is holy ground.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I have seen, I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt, and I have heard their groaning, and am come down to deliver them. And now come, I will send thee into Egypt.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This Moses whom they refused, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He brought them out, after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt, and in the Red sea, and in the wilderness forty years.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is that Moses, which said unto the children of Israel, A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This is he, that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina, and with our fathers: who received the lively oracles to give unto us:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To whom our fathers would not obey, but thrust him from them, and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying unto Aaron, Make us gods to go before us: for as for this Moses, which brought us out of the land of Egypt, we wot not what is become of him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they made a calf in those days, and offered sacrifice unto the idol, and rejoiced in the works of their own hands.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then God turned, and gave them up to worship the host of heaven; as it is written in the book of the prophets, O ye house of Israel, have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Yea, ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch, and the star of your god Remphan, figures which ye made to worship them: and I will carry you away beyond Babylon.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness, as he had appointed, speaking unto Moses, that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who found favour before God, and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Solomon built him an house.

column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Hath not my hand made all these things?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears, ye do always resist the Holy Ghost: as your fathers did, so do ye.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels, and have not kept it.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they heard these things, they were cut to the heart, and they gnashed on him with their teeth.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he kneeled down, and cried with a loud voice, Lord, lay not this sin to their charge. And when he had said this, he fell asleep.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Saul was consenting unto his death. And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria, except the apostles.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial, and made great lamentation over him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there was great joy in that city.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But there was a certain man, called Simon, which beforetime in the same city used sorcery, and bewitched the people of Samaria, giving out that himself was some great one:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To whom they all gave heed, from the least to the greatest, saying, This man is the great power of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And to him they had regard, because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
