column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Simon himself believed also: and when he was baptized, he continued with Philip, and wondered, beholding the miracles and signs which were done.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God, they sent unto them Peter and John:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who, when they were come down, prayed for them, that they might receive the Holy Ghost:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (For as yet he was fallen upon none of them: only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus.)

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then laid they their hands on them, and they received the Holy Ghost.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles' hands the Holy Ghost was given, he offered them money,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Peter said unto him, Thy money perish with thee, because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter: for thy heart is not right in the sight of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness, and pray God, if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness, and in the bond of iniquity.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then answered Simon, and said, Pray ye to the Lord for me, that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip, saying, Arise, and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza, which is desert.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he arose and went: and, behold, a man of Ethiopia, an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians, who had the charge of all her treasure, and had come to Jerusalem for to worship,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Was returning, and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the Spirit said unto Philip, Go near, and join thyself to this chariot.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Philip ran thither to him, and heard him read the prophet Esaias, and said, Understandest thou what thou readest?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, How can I, except some man should guide me? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The place of the scripture which he read was this, He was led as a sheep to the slaughter; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer, so opened he not his mouth:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away: and who shall declare his generation? for his life is taken from the earth.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Philip opened his mouth, and began at the same scripture, and preached unto him Jesus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they went on their way, they came unto a certain water: and the eunuch said, See, here is water; what doth hinder me to be baptized?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Philip said, If thou believest with all thine heart, thou mayest. And he answered and said, I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he commanded the chariot to stand still: and they went down both into the water, both Philip and the eunuch; and he baptized him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come up out of the water, the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip, that the eunuch saw him no more: and he went on his way rejoicing.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Philip was found at Azotus: and passing through he preached in all the cities, till he came to Caesarea.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues, that if he found any of this way, whether they were men or women, he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as he journeyed, he came near Damascus: and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he fell to the earth, and heard a voice saying unto him, Saul, Saul, why persecutest thou me?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said, Who art thou, Lord? And the Lord said, I am Jesus whom thou persecutest: it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he trembling and astonished said, Lord, what wilt thou have me to do? And the Lord said unto him, Arise, and go into the city, and it shall be told thee what thou must do.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless, hearing a voice, but seeing no man.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Saul arose from the earth; and when his eyes were opened, he saw no man: but they led him by the hand, and brought him into Damascus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he was three days without sight, and neither did eat nor drink.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus, named Ananias; and to him said the Lord in a vision, Ananias. And he said, Behold, I am here, Lord.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Lord said unto him, Arise, and go into the street which is called Straight, and inquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul, of Tarsus: for, behold, he prayeth,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in, and putting his hand on him, that he might receive his sight.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Ananias answered, Lord, I have heard by many of this man, how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the Lord said unto him, Go thy way: for he is a chosen vessel unto me, to bear my name before the Gentiles, and kings, and the children of Israel:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name's sake.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Ananias went his way, and entered into the house; and putting his hands on him said, Brother Saul, the Lord, even Jesus, that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest, hath sent me, that thou mightest receive thy sight, and be filled with the Holy Ghost.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales: and he received sight forthwith, and arose, and was baptized.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had received meat, he was strengthened. Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues, that he is the Son of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But all that heard him were amazed, and said; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem, and came hither for that intent, that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Saul increased the more in strength, and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus, proving that this is very Christ.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after that many days were fulfilled, the Jews took counsel to kill him:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But their laying await was known of Saul. And they watched the gates day and night to kill him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the disciples took him by night, and let him down by the wall in a basket.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem, he assayed to join himself to the disciples: but they were all afraid of him, and believed not that he was a disciple.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Barnabas took him, and brought him to the apostles, and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way, and that he had spoken to him, and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus, and disputed against the Grecians: but they went about to slay him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which when the brethren knew, they brought him down to Caesarea, and sent him forth to Tarsus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria, and were edified; and walking in the fear of the Lord, and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost, were multiplied.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, as Peter passed throughout all quarters, he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas, which had kept his bed eight years, and was sick of the palsy.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Peter said unto him, Aeneas, Jesus Christ maketh thee whole: arise, and make thy bed. And he arose immediately.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him, and turned to the Lord.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha, which by interpretation is called Dorcas: this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass in those days, that she was sick, and died: whom when they had washed, they laid her in an upper chamber.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa, and the disciples had heard that Peter was there, they sent unto him two men, desiring him that he would not delay to come to them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Peter arose and went with them. When he was come, they brought him into the upper chamber: and all the widows stood by him weeping, and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made, while she was with them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Peter put them all forth, and kneeled down, and prayed; and turning him to the body said, Tabitha, arise. And she opened her eyes: and when she saw Peter, she sat up.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he gave her his hand, and lifted her up, and when he had called the saints and widows, presented her alive.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it was known throughout all Joppa; and many believed in the Lord.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius, a centurion of the band called the Italian band,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: A devout man, and one that feared God with all his house, which gave much alms to the people, and prayed to God alway.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him, and saying unto him, Cornelius.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he looked on him, he was afraid, and said, What is it, Lord? And he said unto him, Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now send men to Joppa, and call for one Simon, whose surname is Peter:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner, whose house is by the sea side: he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed, he called two of his household servants, and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had declared all these things unto them, he sent them to Joppa.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: On the morrow, as they went on their journey, and drew nigh unto the city, Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he became very hungry, and would have eaten: but while they made ready, he fell into a trance,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saw heaven opened, and a certain vessel descending unto him, as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners, and let down to the earth:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth, and wild beasts, and creeping things, and fowls of the air.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there came a voice to him, Rise, Peter; kill, and eat.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Peter said, Not so, Lord; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the voice spake unto him again the second time, What God hath cleansed, that call not thou common.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: This was done thrice: and the vessel was received up again into heaven.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean, behold, the men which were sent from Cornelius had made inquiry for Simon's house, and stood before the gate,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And called, and asked whether Simon, which was surnamed Peter, were lodged there.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: While Peter thought on the vision, the Spirit said unto him, Behold, three men seek thee.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Arise therefore, and get thee down, and go with them, doubting nothing: for I have sent them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius; and said, Behold, I am he whom ye seek: what is the cause wherefore ye are come?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said, Cornelius the centurion, a just man, and one that feareth God, and of good report among all the nation of the Jews, was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house, and to hear words of thee.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then called he them in, and lodged them. And on the morrow Peter went away with them, and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea. And Cornelius waited for them, and had called together his kinsmen and near friends.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as Peter was coming in, Cornelius met him, and fell down at his feet, and worshipped him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Peter took him up, saying, Stand up; I myself also am a man.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as he talked with him, he went in, and found many that were come together.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he said unto them, Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company, or come unto one of another nation; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying, as soon as I was sent for: I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Cornelius said, Four days ago I was fasting until this hour; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house, and, behold, a man stood before me in bright clothing,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said, Cornelius, thy prayer is heard, and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Send therefore to Joppa, and call hither Simon, whose surname is Peter; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side: who, when he cometh, shall speak unto thee.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Immediately therefore I sent to thee; and thou hast well done that thou art come. Now therefore are we all here present before God, to hear all things that are commanded thee of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Peter opened his mouth, and said, Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But in every nation he that feareth him, and worketh righteousness, is accepted with him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel, preaching peace by Jesus Christ: (he is Lord of all:)

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That word, I say, ye know, which was published throughout all Judaea, and began from Galilee, after the baptism which John preached;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews, and in Jerusalem; whom they slew and hanged on a tree:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Him God raised up the third day, and shewed him openly;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Not to all the people, but unto witnesses chosen before of God, even to us, who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he commanded us to preach unto the people, and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To him give all the prophets witness, that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: While Peter yet spake these words, the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished, as many as came with Peter, because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For they heard them speak with tongues, and magnify God. Then answered Peter,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Can any man forbid water, that these should not be baptized, which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord. Then prayed they him to tarry certain days.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem, they that were of the circumcision contended with him,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised, and didst eat with them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning, and expounded it by order unto them, saying,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I was in the city of Joppa praying: and in a trance I saw a vision, A certain vessel descend, as it had been a great sheet, let down from heaven by four corners; and it came even to me:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes, I considered, and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth, and wild beasts, and creeping things, and fowls of the air.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And I heard a voice saying unto me, Arise, Peter; slay and eat.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But I said, Not so, Lord: for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the voice answered me again from heaven, What God hath cleansed, that call not thou common.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this was done three times: and all were drawn up again into heaven.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was, sent from Caesarea unto me.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the Spirit bade me go with them, nothing doubting. Moreover these six brethren accompanied me, and we entered into the man's house:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house, which stood and said unto him, Send men to Joppa, and call for Simon, whose surname is Peter;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who shall tell thee words, whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as I began to speak, the Holy Ghost fell on them, as on us at the beginning.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then remembered I the word of the Lord, how that he said, John indeed baptized with water; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us, who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ; what was I, that I could withstand God?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they heard these things, they held their peace, and glorified God, saying, Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice, and Cyprus, and Antioch, preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene, which, when they were come to Antioch, spake unto the Grecians, preaching the Lord Jesus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the hand of the Lord was with them: and a great number believed, and turned unto the Lord.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem: and they sent forth Barnabas, that he should go as far as Antioch.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who, when he came, and had seen the grace of God, was glad, and exhorted them all, that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he was a good man, and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith: and much people was added unto the Lord.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus, for to seek Saul:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had found him, he brought him unto Antioch. And it came to pass, that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church, and taught much people. And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there stood up one of them named Agabus, and signified by the Spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world: which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the disciples, every man according to his ability, determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which also they did, and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And because he saw it pleased the Jews, he proceeded further to take Peter also. (Then were the days of unleavened bread.)

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had apprehended him, he put him in prison, and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Peter therefore was kept in prison: but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Herod would have brought him forth, the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers, bound with two chains: and the keepers before the door kept the prison.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And, behold, the angel of the Lord came upon him, and a light shined in the prison: and he smote Peter on the side, and raised him up, saying, Arise up quickly. And his chains fell off from his hands.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the angel said unto him, Gird thyself, and bind on thy sandals. And so he did. And he saith unto him, Cast thy garment about thee, and follow me.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he went out, and followed him; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel; but thought he saw a vision.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When they were past the first and the second ward, they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city; which opened to them of his own accord: and they went out, and passed on through one street; and forthwith the angel departed from him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Peter was come to himself, he said, Now I know of a surety, that the Lord hath sent his angel, and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod, and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had considered the thing, he came to the house of Mary the mother of John, whose surname was Mark; where many were gathered together praying.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate, a damsel came to hearken, named Rhoda.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when she knew Peter's voice, she opened not the gate for gladness, but ran in, and told how Peter stood before the gate.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said unto her, Thou art mad. But she constantly affirmed that it was even so. Then said they, It is his angel.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Peter continued knocking: and when they had opened the door, and saw him, they were astonished.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he, beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace, declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison. And he said, Go shew these things unto James, and to the brethren. And he departed, and went into another place.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now as soon as it was day, there was no small stir among the soldiers, what was become of Peter.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when Herod had sought for him, and found him not, he examined the keepers, and commanded that they should be put to death. And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea, and there abode.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon: but they came with one accord to him, and, having made Blastus the king's chamberlain their friend, desired peace; because their country was nourished by the king's country.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And upon a set day Herod, arrayed in royal apparel, sat upon his throne, and made an oration unto them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the people gave a shout, saying, It is the voice of a god, and not of a man.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him, because he gave not God the glory: and he was eaten of worms, and gave up the ghost.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the word of God grew and multiplied.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem, when they had fulfilled their ministry, and took with them John, whose surname was Mark.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers; as Barnabas, and Simeon that was called Niger, and Lucius of Cyrene, and Manaen, which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch, and Saul.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: As they ministered to the Lord, and fasted, the Holy Ghost said, Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had fasted and prayed, and laid their hands on them, they sent them away.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So they, being sent forth by the Holy Ghost, departed unto Seleucia; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were at Salamis, they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews: and they had also John to their minister.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos, they found a certain sorcerer, a false prophet, a Jew, whose name was Bar-jesus:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was with the deputy of the country, Sergius Paulus, a prudent man; who called for Barnabas and Saul, and desired to hear the word of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Elymas the sorcerer (for so is his name by interpretation) withstood them, seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Saul, (who also is called Paul,) filled with the Holy Ghost, set his eyes on him,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And said, O full of all subtilty and all mischief, thou child of the devil, thou enemy of all righteousness, wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And now, behold, the hand of the Lord is upon thee, and thou shalt be blind, not seeing the sun for a season. And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the deputy, when he saw what was done, believed, being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos, they came to Perga in Pamphylia: and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when they departed from Perga, they came to Antioch in Pisidia, and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and sat down.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them, saying, Ye men and brethren, if ye have any word of exhortation for the people, say on.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Paul stood up, and beckoning with his hand said, Men of Israel, and ye that fear God, give audience.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers, and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt, and with an high arm brought he them out of it.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan, he divided their land to them by lot.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after that he gave unto them judges about the space of four hundred and fifty years, until Samuel the prophet.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And afterward they desired a king: and God gave unto them Saul the son of Cis, a man of the tribe of Benjamin, by the space of forty years.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had removed him, he raised up unto them David to be their king; to whom also he gave testimony, and said, I have found David the son of Jesse, a man after mine own heart, which shall fulfil all my will.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Of this man's seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour, Jesus:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as John fulfilled his course, he said, Whom think ye that I am? I am not he. But, behold, there cometh one after me, whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Men and brethren, children of the stock of Abraham, and whosoever among you feareth God, to you is the word of this salvation sent.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For they that dwell at Jerusalem, and their rulers, because they knew him not, nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day, they have fulfilled them in condemning him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And though they found no cause of death in him, yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him, they took him down from the tree, and laid him in a sepulchre.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But God raised him from the dead:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he was seen many days of them which came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem, who are his witnesses unto the people.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And we declare unto you glad tidings, how that the promise which was made unto the fathers,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children, in that he hath raised up Jesus again; as it is also written in the second psalm, Thou art my Son, this day have I begotten thee.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead, now no more to return to corruption, he said on this wise, I will give you the sure mercies of David.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm, Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For David, after he had served his own generation by the will of God, fell on sleep, and was laid unto his fathers, and saw corruption:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he, whom God raised again, saw no corruption.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Be it known unto you therefore, men and brethren, that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And by him all that believe are justified from all things, from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Beware therefore, lest that come upon you, which is spoken of in the prophets;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold, ye despisers, and wonder, and perish: for I work a work in your days, a work which ye shall in no wise believe, though a man declare it unto you.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue, the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when the congregation was broken up, many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas: who, speaking to them, persuaded them to continue in the grace of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the Jews saw the multitudes, they were filled with envy, and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul, contradicting and blaspheming.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Paul and Barnabas waxed bold, and said, It was necessary that the word of God should first have been spoken to you: but seeing ye put it from you, and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life, lo, we turn to the Gentiles.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For so hath the Lord commanded us, saying, I have set thee to be a light of the Gentiles, that thou shouldest be for salvation unto the ends of the earth.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the Gentiles heard this, they were glad, and glorified the word of the Lord: and as many as were ordained to eternal life believed.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women, and the chief men of the city, and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas, and expelled them out of their coasts.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them, and came unto Iconium.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the disciples were filled with joy, and with the Holy Ghost.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass in Iconium, that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews, and so spake, that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles, and made their minds evil affected against the brethren.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord, which gave testimony unto the word of his grace, and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the multitude of the city was divided: and part held with the Jews, and part with the apostles.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when there was an assault made both of the Gentiles, and also of the Jews with their rulers, to use them despitefully, and to stone them,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: They were ware of it, and fled unto Lystra and Derbe, cities of Lycaonia, and unto the region that lieth round about:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there they preached the gospel.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there sat a certain man at Lystra, impotent in his feet, being a cripple from his mother's womb, who never had walked:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The same heard Paul speak: who steadfastly beholding him, and perceiving that he had faith to be healed,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Said with a loud voice, Stand upright on thy feet. And he leaped and walked.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when the people saw what Paul had done, they lifted up their voices, saying in the speech of Lycaonia, The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they called Barnabas, Jupiter; and Paul, Mercurius, because he was the chief speaker.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then the priest of Jupiter, which was before their city, brought oxen and garlands unto the gates, and would have done sacrifice with the people.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which when the apostles, Barnabas and Paul, heard of, they rent their clothes, and ran in among the people, crying out,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And saying, Sirs, why do ye these things? We also are men of like passions with you, and preach unto you that ye should turn from these vanities unto the living God, which made heaven, and earth, and the sea, and all things that are therein:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness, in that he did good, and gave us rain from heaven, and fruitful seasons, filling our hearts with food and gladness.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people, that they had not done sacrifice unto them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there came thither certain Jews from Antioch and Iconium, who persuaded the people, and, having stoned Paul, drew him out of the city, supposing he had been dead.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Howbeit, as the disciples stood round about him, he rose up, and came into the city: and the next day he departed with Barnabas to Derbe.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had preached the gospel to that city, and had taught many, they returned again to Lystra, and to Iconium, and Antioch,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Confirming the souls of the disciples, and exhorting them to continue in the faith, and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had ordained them elders in every church, and had prayed with fasting, they commended them to the Lord, on whom they believed.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia, they came to Pamphylia.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had preached the word in Perga, they went down into Attalia:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And thence sailed to Antioch, from whence they had been recommended to the grace of God for the work which they fulfilled.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come, and had gathered the church together, they rehearsed all that God had done with them, and how he had opened the door of faith unto the Gentiles.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And there they abode long time with the disciples.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And certain men which came down from Judaea taught the brethren, and said, Except ye be circumcised after the manner of Moses, ye cannot be saved.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: When therefore Paul and Barnabas had no small dissension and disputation with them, they determined that Paul and Barnabas, and certain other of them, should go up to Jerusalem unto the apostles and elders about this question.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And being brought on their way by the church, they passed through Phenice and Samaria, declaring the conversion of the Gentiles: and they caused great joy unto all the brethren.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they were come to Jerusalem, they were received of the church, and of the apostles and elders, and they declared all things that God had done with them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But there rose up certain of the sect of the Pharisees which believed, saying, That it was needful to circumcise them, and to command them to keep the law of Moses.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the apostles and elders came together for to consider of this matter.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when there had been much disputing, Peter rose up, and said unto them, Men and brethren, ye know how that a good while ago God made choice among us, that the Gentiles by my mouth should hear the word of the gospel, and believe.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And God, which knoweth the hearts, bare them witness, giving them the Holy Ghost, even as he did unto us;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And put no difference between us and them, purifying their hearts by faith.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now therefore why tempt ye God, to put a yoke upon the neck of the disciples, which neither our fathers nor we were able to bear?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But we believe that through the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ we shall be saved, even as they.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then all the multitude kept silence, and gave audience to Barnabas and Paul, declaring what miracles and wonders God had wrought among the Gentiles by them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after they had held their peace, James answered, saying, Men and brethren, hearken unto me:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Simeon hath declared how God at the first did visit the Gentiles, to take out of them a people for his name.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And to this agree the words of the prophets; as it is written,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After this I will return, and will build again the tabernacle of David, which is fallen down; and I will build again the ruins thereof, and I will set it up:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That the residue of men might seek after the Lord, and all the Gentiles, upon whom my name is called, saith the Lord, who doeth all these things.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Known unto God are all his works from the beginning of the world.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore my sentence is, that we trouble not them, which from among the Gentiles are turned to God:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But that we write unto them, that they abstain from pollutions of idols, and from fornication, and from things strangled, and from blood.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For Moses of old time hath in every city them that preach him, being read in the synagogues every sabbath day.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then pleased it the apostles and elders, with the whole church, to send chosen men of their own company to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas; namely, Judas surnamed Barsabas, and Silas, chief men among the brethren:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they wrote letters by them after this manner; The apostles and elders and brethren send greeting unto the brethren which are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Forasmuch as we have heard, that certain which went out from us have troubled you with words, subverting your souls, saying, Ye must be circumcised, and keep the law: to whom we gave no such commandment:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: It seemed good unto us, being assembled with one accord, to send chosen men unto you with our beloved Barnabas and Paul,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Men that have hazarded their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: We have sent therefore Judas and Silas, who shall also tell you the same things by mouth.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For it seemed good to the Holy Ghost, and to us, to lay upon you no greater burden than these necessary things;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That ye abstain from meats offered to idols, and from blood, and from things strangled, and from fornication: from which if ye keep yourselves, ye shall do well. Fare ye well.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So when they were dismissed, they came to Antioch: and when they had gathered the multitude together, they delivered the epistle:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which when they had read, they rejoiced for the consolation.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Judas and Silas, being prophets also themselves, exhorted the brethren with many words, and confirmed them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after they had tarried there a space, they were let go in peace from the brethren unto the apostles.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Notwithstanding it pleased Silas to abide there still.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Paul also and Barnabas continued in Antioch, teaching and preaching the word of the Lord, with many others also.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some days after Paul said unto Barnabas, Let us go again and visit our brethren in every city where we have preached the word of the Lord, and see how they do.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Barnabas determined to take with them John, whose surname was Mark.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Paul thought not good to take him with them, who departed from them from Pamphylia, and went not with them to the work.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the contention was so sharp between them, that they departed asunder one from the other: and so Barnabas took Mark, and sailed unto Cyprus;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Paul chose Silas, and departed, being recommended by the brethren unto the grace of God.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he went through Syria and Cilicia, confirming the churches.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then came he to Derbe and Lystra: and, behold, a certain disciple was there, named Timotheus, the son of a certain woman, which was a Jewess, and believed; but his father was a Greek:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which was well reported of by the brethren that were at Lystra and Iconium.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Him would Paul have to go forth with him; and took and circumcised him because of the Jews which were in those quarters: for they knew all that his father was a Greek.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And as they went through the cities, they delivered them the decrees for to keep, that were ordained of the apostles and elders which were at Jerusalem.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And so were the churches established in the faith, and increased in number daily.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when they had gone throughout Phrygia and the region of Galatia, and were forbidden of the Holy Ghost to preach the word in Asia,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: After they were come to Mysia, they assayed to go into Bithynia: but the Spirit suffered them not.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they passing by Mysia came down to Troas.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a vision appeared to Paul in the night; There stood a man of Macedonia, and prayed him, saying, Come over into Macedonia, and help us.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And after he had seen the vision, immediately we endeavoured to go into Macedonia, assuredly gathering that the Lord had called us for to preach the gospel unto them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore loosing from Troas, we came with a straight course to Samothracia, and the next day to Neapolis;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And from thence to Philippi, which is the chief city of that part of Macedonia, and a colony: and we were in that city abiding certain days.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And on the sabbath we went out of the city by a river side, where prayer was wont to be made; and we sat down, and spake unto the women which resorted thither.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And a certain woman named Lydia, a seller of purple, of the city of Thyatira, which worshipped God, heard us: whose heart the Lord opened, that she attended unto the things which were spoken of Paul.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when she was baptized, and her household, she besought us, saying, If ye have judged me to be faithful to the Lord, come into my house, and abide there. And she constrained us.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, as we went to prayer, a certain damsel possessed with a spirit of divination met us, which brought her masters much gain by soothsaying:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: The same followed Paul and us, and cried, saying, These men are the servants of the most high God, which shew unto us the way of salvation.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And this did she many days. But Paul, being grieved, turned and said to the spirit, I command thee in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her. And he came out the same hour.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when her masters saw that the hope of their gains was gone, they caught Paul and Silas, and drew them into the marketplace unto the rulers,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And brought them to the magistrates, saying, These men, being Jews, do exceedingly trouble our city,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And teach customs, which are not lawful for us to receive, neither to observe, being Romans.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the multitude rose up together against them: and the magistrates rent off their clothes, and commanded to beat them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had laid many stripes upon them, they cast them into prison, charging the jailor to keep them safely:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who, having received such a charge, thrust them into the inner prison, and made their feet fast in the stocks.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And at midnight Paul and Silas prayed, and sang praises unto God: and the prisoners heard them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And suddenly there was a great earthquake, so that the foundations of the prison were shaken: and immediately all the doors were opened, and every one's bands were loosed.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the keeper of the prison awaking out of his sleep, and seeing the prison doors open, he drew out his sword, and would have killed himself, supposing that the prisoners had been fled.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Paul cried with a loud voice, saying, Do thyself no harm: for we are all here.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then he called for a light, and sprang in, and came trembling, and fell down before Paul and Silas,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And brought them out, and said, Sirs, what must I do to be saved?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved, and thy house.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they spake unto him the word of the Lord, and to all that were in his house.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And he took them the same hour of the night, and washed their stripes; and was baptized, he and all his, straightway.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had brought them into his house, he set meat before them, and rejoiced, believing in God with all his house.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when it was day, the magistrates sent the serjeants, saying, Let those men go.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the keeper of the prison told this saying to Paul, The magistrates have sent to let you go: now therefore depart, and go in peace.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But Paul said unto them, They have beaten us openly uncondemned, being Romans, and have cast us into prison; and now do they thrust us out privily? nay verily; but let them come themselves and fetch us out.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the serjeants told these words unto the magistrates: and they feared, when they heard that they were Romans.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they came and besought them, and brought them out, and desired them to depart out of the city.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they went out of the prison, and entered into the house of Lydia: and when they had seen the brethren, they comforted them, and departed.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now when they had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia, they came to Thessalonica, where was a synagogue of the Jews:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Paul, as his manner was, went in unto them, and three sabbath days reasoned with them out of the scriptures,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Opening and alleging, that Christ must needs have suffered, and risen again from the dead; and that this Jesus, whom I preach unto you, is Christ.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some of them believed, and consorted with Paul and Silas; and of the devout Greeks a great multitude, and of the chief women not a few.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But the Jews which believed not, moved with envy, took unto them certain lewd fellows of the baser sort, and gathered a company, and set all the city on an uproar, and assaulted the house of Jason, and sought to bring them out to the people.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they found them not, they drew Jason and certain brethren unto the rulers of the city, crying, These that have turned the world upside down are come hither also;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Whom Jason hath received: and these all do contrary to the decrees of Caesar, saying that there is another king, one Jesus.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they troubled the people and the rulers of the city, when they heard these things.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had taken security of Jason, and of the other, they let them go.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas by night unto Berea: who coming thither went into the synagogue of the Jews.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: These were more noble than those in Thessalonica, in that they received the word with all readiness of mind, and searched the scriptures daily, whether those things were so.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore many of them believed; also of honourable women which were Greeks, and of men, not a few.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the Jews of Thessalonica had knowledge that the word of God was preached of Paul at Berea, they came thither also, and stirred up the people.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And then immediately the brethren sent away Paul to go as it were to the sea: but Silas and Timotheus abode there still.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they that conducted Paul brought him unto Athens: and receiving a commandment unto Silas and Timotheus for to come to him with all speed, they departed.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now while Paul waited for them at Athens, his spirit was stirred in him, when he saw the city wholly given to idolatry.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore disputed he in the synagogue with the Jews, and with the devout persons, and in the market daily with them that met with him.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then certain philosophers of the Epicureans, and of the Stoicks, encountered him. And some said, What will this babbler say? other some, He seemeth to be a setter forth of strange gods: because he preached unto them Jesus, and the resurrection.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they took him, and brought him unto Areopagus, saying, May we know what this new doctrine, whereof thou speakest, is?

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For thou bringest certain strange things to our ears: we would know therefore what these things mean.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (For all the Athenians and strangers which were there spent their time in nothing else, but either to tell, or to hear some new thing.)

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Then Paul stood in the midst of Mars' hill, and said, Ye men of Athens, I perceive that in all things ye are too superstitious.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as I passed by, and beheld your devotions, I found an altar with this inscription, To the Unknown God. Whom therefore ye ignorantly worship, him declare I unto you.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: God that made the world and all things therein, seeing that he is Lord of heaven and earth, dwelleth not in temples made with hands;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Neither is worshipped with men's hands, as though he needed any thing, seeing he giveth to all life, and breath, and all things;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And hath made of one blood all nations of men for to dwell on all the face of the earth, and hath determined the times before appointed, and the bounds of their habitation;

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That they should seek the Lord, if haply they might feel after him, and find him, though he be not far from every one of us:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For in him we live, and move, and have our being; as certain also of your own poets have said, For we are also his offspring.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Forasmuch then as we are the offspring of God, we ought not to think that the Godhead is like unto gold, or silver, or stone, graven by art and man's device.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And the times of this ignorance God winked at; but now commandeth all men every where to repent:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Because he hath appointed a day, in the which he will judge the world in righteousness by that man whom he hath ordained; whereof he hath given assurance unto all men, in that he hath raised him from the dead.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they heard of the resurrection of the dead, some mocked: and others said, We will hear thee again of this matter.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So Paul departed from among them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Howbeit certain men clave unto him, and believed: among the which was Dionysius the Areopagite, and a woman named Damaris, and others with them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
