column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And it came to pass, that after three days Paul called the chief of the Jews together: and when they were come together, he said unto them, Men and brethren, though I have committed nothing against the people, or customs of our fathers, yet was I delivered prisoner from Jerusalem into the hands of the Romans.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who, when they had examined me, would have let me go, because there was no cause of death in me.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But when the Jews spake against it, I was constrained to appeal unto Caesar; not that I had ought to accuse my nation of.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For this cause therefore have I called for you, to see you, and to speak with you: because that for the hope of Israel I am bound with this chain.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And they said unto him, We neither received letters out of Judaea concerning thee, neither any of the brethren that came shewed or spake any harm of thee.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But we desire to hear of thee what thou thinkest: for as concerning this sect, we know that every where it is spoken against.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they had appointed him a day, there came many to him into his lodging; to whom he expounded and testified the kingdom of God, persuading them concerning Jesus, both out of the law of Moses, and out of the prophets, from morning till evening.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And some believed the things which were spoken, and some believed not.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when they agreed not among themselves, they departed, after that Paul had spoken one word, Well spake the Holy Ghost by Esaias the prophet unto our fathers,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Saying, Go unto this people, and say, Hearing ye shall hear, and shall not understand; and seeing ye shall see, and not perceive:

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the heart of this people is waxed gross, and their ears are dull of hearing, and their eyes have they closed; lest they should see with their eyes, and hear with their ears, and understand with their heart, and should be converted, and I should heal them.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Be it known therefore unto you, that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles, and that they will hear it.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And when he had said these words, the Jews departed, and had great reasoning among themselves.

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And Paul dwelt two whole years in his own hired house, and received all that came in unto him,

column8: The Acts of the Apostles
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Preaching the kingdom of God, and teaching those things which concern the Lord Jesus Christ, with all confidence, no man forbidding him.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Paul, a servant of Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, separated unto the gospel of God,

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures,)

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord, which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And declared to be the Son of God with power, according to the spirit of holiness, by the resurrection from the dead:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: By whom we have received grace and apostleship, for obedience to the faith among all nations, for his name:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To all that be in Rome, beloved of God, called to be saints: Grace to you and peace from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: First, I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all, that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For God is my witness, whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son, that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Making request, if by any means now at length I might have a prosperous journey by the will of God to come unto you.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I long to see you, that I may impart unto you some spiritual gift, to the end ye may be established;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: That is, that I may be comforted together with you by the mutual faith both of you and me.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Now I would not have you ignorant, brethren, that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you, (but was let hitherto,) that I might have some fruit among you also, even as among other Gentiles.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: I am debtor both to the Greeks, and to the Barbarians; both to the wise, and to the unwise.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: So, as much as in me is, I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ: for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth; to the Jew first, and also to the Greek.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith: as it is written, The just shall live by faith.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men, who hold the truth in unrighteousness;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Because that which may be known of God is manifest in them; for God hath shewed it unto them.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen, being understood by the things that are made, even his eternal power and Godhead; so that they are without excuse:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Because that, when they knew God, they glorified him not as God, neither were thankful; but became vain in their imaginations, and their foolish heart was darkened.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Professing themselves to be wise, they became fools,

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man, and to birds, and fourfooted beasts, and creeping things.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts, to dishonour their own bodies between themselves:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who changed the truth of God into a lie, and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator, who is blessed for ever. Amen.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections: for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And likewise also the men, leaving the natural use of the woman, burned in their lust one toward another; men with men working that which is unseemly, and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge, God gave them over to a reprobate mind, to do those things which are not convenient;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Being filled with all unrighteousness, fornication, wickedness, covetousness, maliciousness; full of envy, murder, debate, deceit, malignity; whisperers,

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Backbiters, haters of God, despiteful, proud, boasters, inventors of evil things, disobedient to parents,

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Without understanding, covenantbreakers, without natural affection, implacable, unmerciful:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who knowing the judgment of God, that they which commit such things are worthy of death, not only do the same, but have pleasure in them that do them.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore thou art inexcusable, O man, whosoever thou art that judgest: for wherein thou judgest another, thou condemnest thyself; for thou that judgest doest the same things.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And thinkest thou this, O man, that judgest them which do such things, and doest the same, that thou shalt escape the judgment of God?

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance?

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Who will render to every man according to his deeds:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: To them who by patient continuance in well doing seek for glory and honour and immortality, eternal life:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But unto them that are contentious, and do not obey the truth, but obey unrighteousness, indignation and wrath,

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Tribulation and anguish, upon every soul of man that doeth evil, of the Jew first, and also of the Gentile;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But glory, honour, and peace, to every man that worketh good, to the Jew first, and also to the Gentile:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For there is no respect of persons with God.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law: and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: (For not the hearers of the law are just before God, but the doers of the law shall be justified.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For when the Gentiles, which have not the law, do by nature the things contained in the law, these, having not the law, are a law unto themselves:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts, their conscience also bearing witness, and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another;)

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Behold, thou art called a Jew, and restest in the law, and makest thy boast of God,

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And knowest his will, and approvest the things that are more excellent, being instructed out of the law;

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind, a light of them which are in darkness,

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: An instructor of the foolish, a teacher of babes, which hast the form of knowledge and of the truth in the law.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thou therefore which teachest another, teachest thou not thyself? thou that preachest a man should not steal, dost thou steal?

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery, dost thou commit adultery? thou that abhorrest idols, dost thou commit sacrilege?

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Thou that makest thy boast of the law, through breaking the law dishonourest thou God?

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you, as it is written.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For circumcision verily profiteth, if thou keep the law: but if thou be a breaker of the law, thy circumcision is made uncircumcision.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law, shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision?

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: And shall not uncircumcision which is by nature, if it fulfil the law, judge thee, who by the letter and circumcision dost transgress the law?

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For he is not a Jew, which is one outwardly; neither is that circumcision, which is outward in the flesh:

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: But he is a Jew, which is one inwardly; and circumcision is that of the heart, in the spirit, and not in the letter; whose praise is not of men, but of God.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: What advantage then hath the Jew? or what profit is there of circumcision?

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: Much every way: chiefly, because that unto them were committed the oracles of God.

column8: The Epistle of Paul the Apostle to the Romans
column9: Of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ
column17: For what if some did not believe? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect?
